zas kyi rdzas rnams sbyangs shing sbyin sreg byed do/ /chags pa'i dus su yang shes rab ma bdag med ma'i gzugs su mos pa byas nas/ de'i mgo bo la oM/ snying gar hUM/ pad+ma'i lte ba la AM bsams nas/ oM pad+ma su kha d+ha ra ma hA rA ga su khaM dat+ta tsa tur A nan+da b+ha ga bi shwa hUM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku

ru Sh+wa me zhes bya ba 'dis pad+ma byin gyis brlabs la/ bdag nyid la yi ge gsum bkod la/ hUM las rdo rje bsgoms nas/ oM las de'i nor bu'o/ /oM badzra ma hA dI Sha tsa tur A nan+da da ya ka kha ga mu khe e ka rA so nA tha hUM hUM hUM ka tra~M` ku ru Sh+Ta me/ zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas/ siM

siMsiM/ ha ha ha zhes bya bas chags pa brtsam par bya'o/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis skad cig ma mtshon par byas nas/ rdzogs pa dang bdud rtsi len gyis blangs la bdag nyid tshim par bya'o/ /nyal ba'i dus su lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du sna tshogs 'dis mos par byas la gnyid log

par bya'o/ /byis pa rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/ /ston pa mgon po zhal brgyad pa'i/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs byas pa des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /dpal dgyes pa rdo rje phyag bcu drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ paN+Di ta A tsar+ya kr-iSh+Ta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI he badzra ba lo kra ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i rim pa/ dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /yi ge gnyis las yang dag 'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug

gtso/ /te ru ka la phyag 'tshal te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ldan pa'i/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdud rtsi gtor ma dbul ba yi/ /cho ga'i thabs kyi rim pa bshad/ /de la gtor ma'i dgos pa ni/ /dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dang / sbyin sreg dang mchod

pa dang / sgrub pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / rigs kyi bu dag tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / yams dang nad med par 'dod pa dang / mu ge zhi bar 'dod pa dang / gnod pa zhi bar 'dod pa dang / dpal dang grags pa 'phel bar

'dod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba zlog par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod dang 'byor pa 'dod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba bzlog par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob par 'dod pa mkhas pas gtor ma'i las la brtson par bya'o/ /de yang gang

zhig ce na gzhung las/ bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang / dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma'i las 'di ci nus brtsam/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /yang kha cig las/ 'byung po kun la gtor ma 'di dag gis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mchod

pa legs byas nas/ /dus kun rnyed pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang / /lha rnams dga' zhing 'gro ba 'byor bar 'gyur/ /'byung po'i tshogs la gtor ma gcig sbyin na/ /sdang dang mngon spyod dgra yi sde 'joms shing / /dgar dang gsad dang dgug par byed pa dang / /zhi zhing

bde dang rgyas par byed pa yin/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /yang slob dpon kha cig gis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /dngos grub chog thams cad la/ /dpal ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu bsngags/ /zhes 'byung bas/

gtor ma'i las 'di shin tu phan yon che'o/ /de la 'dir ni sngags pas 'byung po nyi shu rtsa bzhi la gtor ma sbyin dgos te/ lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /klu chen brgyad dang phyogs skyong brgyad/ /'khor du gtogs pa'i brgyad po rnams/ /rang rang 'khor dang bcas rnams

la/ /rgyun du 'am ni zla ba'am/ /de bzhin lo gcig rgyun 'khor ram/ /zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bcu dang / /mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu la/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg bzlas pa dang / /de bzhin gnod byung dus dag gam/ /ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa dang / /rang gis ji ltar rjes mthun par/ /

ci 'byor pa yi yo byad kyis/ /nan tan du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /de la gtor ma'i g.yos kyang ji ltar zhe na/ me tog bdug spos mar me byug pa dang / /sman rnams dang ni dri dang lha bshos dang / /tshod ma dag dang la du khur ba dang / /zas dron dang ni drug cu par bcas dang /

phye sogs byas pa bsres nas ni/ /'bras chan 'bras kyi phyi nang 'bru bdun dang / /zho dang 'bru mar 'o thug sogs pa bsre/ /khrag dang sha dang sran ma nya sha sogs/ /sbyar chang 'bru chang sna tshogs chan la sogs/ /btsos dang rjen dang rnying dang bcas pa rnams/ /ji bzhin bdud

rtsi lnga dang bsres byas nas/ /de dag kun gyis snod rnams bkang nas su/ /bum pa chus bkang ba yi steng du gzhag /khur ba zan du mar me steng du bltam/ /mtshan mo'i dus su de dag la yang dbul/ /zhes 'byung bas/ drag po la ni dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan steng du gzhag go/ /

gtor ma kha dog las kyis bsgyur ro/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni/ de dang por bdag nyid lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bsgoms nas/ thog ma nam mkha' lta bu la/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yaM gyis mtshan pa/ raM las me'i dkyil 'khor raM

gyis mtshan pa/ de'i steng du a las thod pa/ de'i nang du nyi ma'i steng du hUM b+h+rUM AM dzri'aM khaM dang go ku da ha na las/ lcags kyu lnga dang / bdud rtsi lngar bskyed do/ /de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje a las zla ba la phyed nub pa'o/ /de'i steng du oM gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs/ AH sa

gzi brjid bskyed/ hUM gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dang / dam tshig gi bdud rtsi gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du gru gsum chos 'byung nang du pad+ma sum brtsegs bsam ste/ dang po pad+ma dkar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje dkar po las lha brgyad

oM las bskyed pas bskor/ bar du pad+ma sngon po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje sngon po la hUM las bskyed pa'i phyogs skyong bcu sngon pos bskor/ 'og tu pad+ma dmar po'i dbus su dgyes pa'i rdo rje dmar po la a las bskyed pa'i klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor ro/ /mgron spyan drang

ba'i phyir rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM e a ra li hoH/ hriM hriM hriM/ dzaH hUM baM hoH/ badza DA ka DA ki nI/ badzra dr-i sh+ya hoH/ badzra sa ma ya hoH/ badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pheM gsum brjod pa dang bcas pa las/ snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis bkug la/ oM AH hUM lha

brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang / phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad/ /bka' bzhin 'khor du gtogs pa rnams/ /dam tshig dgongs te gnas 'dir gshegs/ /gzhan yang gru gsum khongs gtogs pa'i/ /zhing skyong tshogs la 'di lta ste/ /oM shing gcig dang

na dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul phug /grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni mtsho la gnas/ /ma mo yi ni gnas rnams nas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /

nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug dang / /bka' las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed me dang drag mo dang / /brjed byed ma dang u ma dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor

ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag mo sdang mo 'chang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me mo/ /sum cu ma dang dbang mo dang / /'jigs byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng phreng chen kha T+wAM ma/ /

sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu chen ma/ /de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /

rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin ba mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig /oM kak+ka D+ha na/ bab+ba n+tA na/ khakh+kha dA na sarba duSh+Ta naM ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ he badzra maN+Dal sa ba ri wA re b+h+yo A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaH/ zhes pas bkug la pad+ma'i

gdan la bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas mchod pas mchod de/ /oM ku ru ku ru a d+hi pa ti tiSh+Tha sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi lha la thim pa'i rjes su/ lce pad+ma'i steng du hUM las rdo rjer byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas pad+ma'i lag pa kha phye ste/

gtor ma la gtad nas gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags brjod do/ /oM AH hUMH hoH badzra b+hai ra bA ya/ badzra b+hai ra bi ya/ dzo ga dzo gi ni/ sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra/ sarba DA ka DA ki nI sh+tsa b+ho/ badzra gau rI/ badzra tsau rI/ badzra bi tA lI/ badzra g+hasma rI/ badzra puk+ka sI/ badzra sa ba rI/ badzra tsaN+DalI/ badzra

DoM bi nI/ a ti kaM /sa pa ri wA re b+h+yo/ i daM ba liM/ gan+d+ha/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ dI pa/ ak+Sha taM/ da da ma hi te dza/ a ka s+t+ya/ sa pa ri wA re b+ho/ i daM ba liM/ gr-ih+nan tu dzaH hUM baM hoH/ saM tri p+ta/ sarba s+t+wA ni shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+Tim ku ru/ rak+Sha haM ku ru/ a ba na ku ru/ gub+ho ka ro du/ kurban+d+ra hUM hUM phaT

swA hA/ i daM ba liM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dza dza dza dza/ badzra d+ha ro tA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM AH hUM hoH/ sarba de ba/ nA ga /yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ ma nu Sha/ a ma nu Sha/ a su ra/ gan+d+ha r+b+ha/ kuM b+hi ra/ g+hi d+ha ri/ ga ru Da/ b+hU ta/ pre ta/ pi ShA tsa/ a pasma ra/ u man+ta/ sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta ra/

badzra DA ka DA ki ni sa pa ri wA re b+h+yo/ /i maM sarba pU dza gan+d+ha/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ dI paM/ nai bi d+h+yaM/ ak+Sha taM da da ma hi te tsam/ a gat+t+yA sa pa ri wA re b+h+yoH/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+nan+du/ kha dan+du/ pi ban+tu/ dzaH hUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ma ma sid+d+hi m+me pre ya ts+tshan+tu/ ya the baM/ ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza ho/ /mA ti kra ma tha/

ma ma sarba kar+t+ya sad su khaM/ bi shud+d+ha ye sa ha ka yi ka /b+ha ban+tu/ hUM hUM phaT/ badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ oM in+da/ dza ma/ dza la/ jak+kha/ b+hU ta/ bah+ni/ ba u/ rak+kha/ tsan+d+ra/ sUdz+dza/ ma ta/ pa p+pa/ ta la/ pA tA la/ a Tha/ sa p+pa/ sA d+ha/ i daM ba liM b+huny+dza/ dzi g+haM/ puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ dI paM/ mAM sa/

am+ba/ kA ts+tsha/ sA d+ha/ khan+ti/ khu Ni/ phe Ta/ gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ oM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis yang bsngo ba ni/ oM lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang / /'jig rten skyong ba 'khor bcas dang / /klu chen brgyad

po 'khor bcas dang / /gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /srin po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /yi dags tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /sha za'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /smyo byed tshogs

rnams ma lus dang / /brjed byed tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus dang / /de la sogs pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma lus tshogs bcas ji snyed rnams/ /'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /mchod sbyin gtor ma

'di snoms la/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la/ /nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang / /dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang / /longs spyod rgya chen kun thob cing / /zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi/ /las kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol/ /dam tshig can gyis bdag la srungs/ /

dngos grub kun gyis bstod grogs mdzod/ /dus min 'chi dang nad rnams dang / /gdon dang bgegs rnams zhi bar mdzod/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bya byed ngan pa zhi bar mdzod/ /'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang / /'bru rnams rgyas shing 'phel bar mdzod/ /bde

legs thams cad 'grub pa dang / /yid la 'dod pa 'grub par shog /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun/ /de la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin tshogs/ /drag cing gtum pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs/ /ma rungs sems can ming 'di long / /dag cing snying rje med pa yi/ /rnal 'byor

ma dang ma mo dang / /mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin sha za dang / /lto 'phye dang ni srin po dang / /gzhan yang sha za khrag 'thung ba'i/ /khyi dang khra dang kaM ka dang / /'ol ba bya rgod la sogs pa'i/ /gzugs can thams cad 'dir gshegs shig /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la/ /gnod

par byed pa 'di zhes pa/ /chung ma nor dang srog dang ni/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'phrog par mdzod/ /rang gi yul nas 'byung ba dang / /dgar ba dang ni bskrad par bgyis/ /bdag gi dpung ni stobs med la/ /dgra ni stobs ldan kho na ste/ /'di nyid khyod kyis bza' ba'i phyir/ /sha dang

khrag dang zhag dang rkang / /bza' ba skom dang bcas pa mdzod/ /dgra lus gsol ba dgra mdangs phrogs/ /rang gi rnal 'byor ci rigs par/ /long la zab nyid du gyis/ /thams cad tshim par bzhes su gsol/ /gang gis bdag la mi tshugs shing / /dgra 'di thams cad

choms par mdzod/ /bdag la las kyi dngos grub ni/ /rgya chen yongs su stsal nas kyang / /nyid kyi gnas dang yul du gshegs/ /ci nus 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la/ /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /pus mo lha nga sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo

sbyar nas khyod la gsol ba ni/ /btsun mo dang ni sras dang g.yog tu bcas/ /gsan cing 'dir gshegs bdag la bka' drin skyobs/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang / /gsang sngags rig sngags mthu dag dang / /chos kyi

dbyings kyi stobs kyi mthus/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pas/ /don rnams yang dag bsams pa kun/ /sems can khams ni ma lus par/ /de dag thams cad ci rigs par/ /thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig /sngags pa gang zhig dgra bgegs tshar

gcad par 'dod pa des/ gzugs gtor ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa mi sdug pa'i gzugs can/ pho nya grangs med pas zos 'thungs par bsam zhing / gtor ma bstabs shing 'di skad las bcol lo/ /oM ma lus zhing na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang /

dpal chen khrag 'thung khro rgyal 'jigs byed tshogs/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /dam can rgya mtsho ma lus dgongs su gsol/ /thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing / /gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sgyu ma lta bur

cir yang ston mdzad pa/ /gtum chen rab rngam tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyigs ma lnga ldan bstan pa 'jig dus 'dis/ /bdud dang mu stegs log par lta ba rnams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/ /tsham ngam drag po'i phrin las myur du mdzod/ /

rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing / /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po dang / /lha yi dbang po 'dod pa'i lha/ /khyab 'jug tshogs kyi

bdag po dang / /b+h+r-iM gi ri ti gzhon nu dang / /dga' byed dbang phyug 'dod lha dang / /nyi ma zla ba gza' chen dang / /smin drug la sogs pa khyung gi mgo /mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas/ /rdo rje sku yi dam tshig can/ /dkar po rtag pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zhal gcig pa la

phyag gnyis te/ /'khor lo dang ni dril bus brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor/ /'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs/ /steng gi lha tshogs bcas pa yi/ /

nam mkha'i ro zhon khyod kyis ni/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+d+ra ru d+hi rak+ta dang / /ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang / /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang / /rdo rje spun dang ming

sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing / /slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /

rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus pa rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing / /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal

bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /brgya byin gshin rje chu bdag dang / /gnod sbyin dbang bdag me yi lha/ /srin po rlung lha la sogs pa/ /srin po'i mgo can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs

ka byas/ /rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig can/ /nag po mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bus brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor/ /'jigs pa'i tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas/ /phyag cu drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil

na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs/ /bar gyi mi tshogs bcas pa yis/ /bar snang ro zhon khyod kyi ni/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+d+ra ru d+hi rak+ta dang / /ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang / /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal

'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang / /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing / /slob dpon slod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug

cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus par rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub

par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing / /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal ba zhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /stobs rgyu dung skyong mtha' yas dang / /nor rgyas bu dang 'jog po dang / /rigs ldan pad+ma chen po

dang / /pad+ma la sogs chu srin mgo /mgyogs pa'i gshog pas gdengs ka byas/ /rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig can/ /dmar po gar dbang dbu rgyan ldan/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/ /pad+ma dang ni dril bus brel/ /rig ma dang ni mnyam du sbyor/ /'jigs pa'i

tshul gyis brkyang bskum gnas/ /phyag rgya drug gis lus la brgyan/ /dus mtha'i me chen klong dkyil na/ /hUM phaT pheM pheM 'jigs par sgrogs/ /'og gi klu tshogs bcas pa yis/ /sa 'og ro zhon khyod kyi ni/ /dam tshig thugs dam dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /

in+d+ra ru d+hi rak+ta dang / /ye shes dam tshig bdud rtsi dang / /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas/ /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes

sun 'byin cing / /slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus

la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus par rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs shing / /bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i bka' bzhin

du/ /shin tu gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'jigs pa na/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo rnal 'byor tshogs/ /zhing skyong drag po ro langs dang / /ma mo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa tshogs/ /sha za brjed byed srul po dang / /nam gru log 'dren la sogs pa/ /gnod sbyin sa

bdag gdug pa'i 'dre/ /la la srin po'i zhal can la/ /mi yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /la la stag gi mgo can la/ /mi yi lus can rngam pa'i gzugs/ /la la seng ge'i mgo can la/ /srin po'i gzugs can shin tu khro/ /la la mkha' lding mgo can la/ /klu

yi lus can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de bzhin bya yi mgo can dang / /gcan gzan lus can sna tshogs rnams/ /la la khro zhing la la rngam/ /la la zhi zhing la la gtum/ /la la 'gying zhing la la lding / /la la sha za khrag 'thung brtson/ /la la khro gtum 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /

la la rab brtson khro gnyer can/ /la la bzhad gad ha ha sgrog /la la 'brug skad bzhin du ldir/ /la la rngam skad pheM pheM sgrogs/ /la la mkha' stong gar gyis 'gengs/ /la la rtsub cing la la gnag /la la dkar zhing rnam par gsal/ /la la dmar zhing chags pa'i

mdog /la la sngo zhing sdang ba'i tshul/ /la la ser po dbyibs mdog rgyas/ /la la khro gnyer smin bu rtsub/ /la la smin bu gyen du 'khyil/ /skra 'khyil nam mkha'i dbyings su khyab/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs khrag 'thung ba'i/ /ljags dril mche ba dmar po gtsigs/ /spyan

gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can/ /rus pa'i bstar phreng sbrul gyis brgyan/ /khrag zhag tshil gyi tshom bus brgyan/ /glang chen ko rlon rnam par bshal/ /stag gi pags pas sham thabs byas/ /na bza' mi yi lpags rlon gsol/ /la la rdo rje gtun shing dang / /ral gri chu gri la sogs

pa'i/ /lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /la la gar gyi phyag rgyas sbyor/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ /phyi rol 'byung po'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /sa steng sa ro zhon thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig phrin las dus la bab/ /hUM he ru ka yi bka' bzhin du/ /in+d+ra ru d+hi rak+ta dang / /ye shes

dam tshig bdud rtsi dang / /sna tshogs gtor ma 'di long la/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dang / /rdo rje spun dang ming sring la/ /gnod par byed pa'i dgra bgegs ni/ /sngags rgyud ye shes sun 'byin cing / /slob dpon smod cing spun la 'khu/ /

byang chub sems spong dam tshig nyams/ /zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul bas/ /gdug pa'i sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /rab tu drongs shig 'dir khug la/ /rdul dang thal ba bzhin du lhogs/ /mngon spyod phrin las dus la bab/ /sha dang khrag dang rus la rol/ /rgyu ma glo snying nang grol

drongs/ /sngon gyi dam las ma 'da' bar/ /bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /de nas gsad pa'i las bzhi bya/ de nas rdo rje'i glu brjod/ de nas chos bshad de/ oM chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du

'byung / /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa 'dis ni dkyil 'khor du/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba der/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /oM shI la

tsaN+Dan le pe taM a gang+d+ya naM pra b+ha ra Na/ po taM ka ku mu mi kI ra NaM bi ha ra taM/ bud+d+ha bi sha ya/ pu na rA ga ma na ya muH/ oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba ka rma su ts+tsha

me/ tsi t+taM shre yaH/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya sa twa AH/ de nas bkra shis brjod/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas

kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes pas rang bzhin gyi mgron gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig gi mgron yi ge gsum du byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bsdu'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ser sna dang / /dbul ba'i dri ma sbyang ba dang / /dngos grub myur du thob

pa dang / /'gro rnams bkod par 'phel phyir byas/ /dge bas 'gro kun byang chub mchog /rin chen gling du myur 'gro shog /dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon chen po a la la badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta kas+tha pa ga thA ga

ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba liM karma kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang / /de yi

chos skyong srung ma la/ /bzod gsol don du 'dud pa dang / /rgyu yi phyir kyang phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba dang / /snga ma'i lan chags bral ba dang / /'phral gyi bar chad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gtor ma rgyun du gtang bar bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po dang / /

phrin las rnam bzhi rtsom pa dang / /dbang bskur chen po byed pa'i tshe/ /gtor ma'i rim pa 'di ltar bya/ /yo byad dang ni bca' thabs dang / /dgod rim dang yang byin rlabs dang / /dbul dang dbang bskur dgye ba bdun/ /las kyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa'o/ /sha dang bdud rtsi zas lnga dang / /

gzhan yang bza' btung sna tshogs te/ /gro ga 'am ras sam shing shun la/ /mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs bya/ /mdor na sna tshogs pa yi rdzas/ /sdig pa med cing gnod pa med/ /yo byad dam par 'di bshad do/ /gzhan yang gtor ma chen po ni/ /shin tu che ba'i snod dag tu/ /

mchod pa'i bye brag kha zas kyis/ /khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu/ /a shwad+tha yi shing dag la/ /gru gsum phyag rgya byas te gzhag /gru gsum rtse la mar me gsum/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu gtang bar bya/ /de ru 'phan dang rgyal mtshan dang / /gdugs dang phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag/

de yi dbus su zan kham gsum/ /steng du b+ha n+d+ha mtshan bzangs dag /khrag chen dag gis gang ba gzhag /gzhan yang mdzes pa'i snod dag tu/ /khengs par bkang ba'i steng dag tu/ /'phan dang rgyal mtshan gdugs rnams gzugs/ /mar me gcig kyang rtag tu gtang / /mkha'

'gro ma dang phyogs skyong ni/ /mdzes pa'i snod du rdzas rnams kyis/ /legs par bkang ste gzhag par bya/ /tshogs dang tshogs kyi rol pa yin/ /lhag ma dag la lhag ma bya/ /kun kyang gcan gzan rjes bzhin nam/ /las kyi dbyibs dang sbyar bar bya/ /chang dang khrag dang chu yis

sbyang / /gtor chen rtsa ba'i dbus su gzhag /yang na byang shar mtshams su gzhag /lhag ma lho yi phyogs su'o/ /phyogs skyong shar te mkha' 'gro nub/ /shin tu lhag ma mdun nam byang / /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /a las snod kyi nang dag tu/ /aM las nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor bsam/ /de yi dbus dang phyogs mtshams su/ /hUM b+h+rUM AM dzr-IM khaM/ na go ku da ha/ dri chu dri chen khrag dang ga bur shel/ /mi dang ba lang khyi glang rta/ /de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam/ /de las rigs lnga yab yum bsam/ /de steng oM las zla ba ste/ /de steng hUM las rdo rje bsam/ /

phaT kyis bud cing 'bar ba dang / /bsros te dros pas yab yum rol/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu dag na gnas pa yi/ /bde gshegs ye shes byang chub sems/ /sems can rnams kyi bkrag gzi mdangs/ /rtsi shing nags tshal bcud bsdus te/ /

slar yang ji bzhin dgug par bya/ /thim nas thams cad 'od du zhu/ /oM AH hUM gis byin gyis brlab/ /las kyi skabs la bab pa dang / /gtor chen b+han+d+ha'i nang du ni/ /sgrub thabs gzhung bzhin bsgoms nas su/ /de yi phyi rim bar khyams la/ /lha brgyad

'khor bcas mos pas bsgom/ /gnyis pa la ni phyogs skyong dang / /de bzhin gsum par klu chen brgyad/ /'khor dang bcas pa mos pas so/ /tshogs kyi rdzas rnams drangs pa la/ /bsang gtor byas te byin gyis brlab/ /phud spros pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blang / /sngags 'di brjod cing

dbul bar bya/ /oM e h+ye hi badzra i daM ba liM khA hi/ lha rnams kun la de bzhin dbul/ /bsrung ba'i dbang sngags brjod cing dbul/ /bstod cing rdo rje glu yang blang / /de nas lhag ma'i phud spros te/ /gru gsum zla ba'i steng dag tu/ /bdag nyid kye yi rdo rjer bsgom/ /de yi khyams

la mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor dang bcas pa mos pas bsam/ /gnyis pa la ni dbang phyug ma/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba ris drug dang / /dmigs kyi yul gyi lha 'dre rnams/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas su/ /oM e h+ye hi/ sarba yo gi ni/ sarba DA ki ni/ prah+ma Ni/ ru tra ni/

ma he shwa ri/ beSh+Na be/ /bA rA hi/ na ya siM ga /a ya te/ ag+na ye/ ba ru Na ye/ ba ya be/ ku mA ri/ ko be ra/ ga ru Ni/ pasna ki /byi na ya ki /b+hi pa sa tri/ b+he pra ma ni/ b+he ska ri/ tsa muN+Di/ sarba de ba/ sarba a su ra/ sarba ma nu Sha/ sarba tir+ya ka /sarba pre ta ka /

sarba na ra ka/ /sarba g+hU ta/ pi shA ca/ U sh+ma n+da/ a sma ra ta ya/ mos pa'i tshul du spyan drangs mchod/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blangs la dbus/ /puSh+pa/ d+hU pa/ dI pa/ gan+d+ha/ nai bi t+ye/ pany+tsa a mr-i te/ ma tha/ dra rtsa ba ta ga te/ tsa tra tsa ma ra/ sa yo tha/ ma tsa ma sa/ ma hA ra k+ta/ na na khA hi/ saM bur+NaM/ i daM ba

liM b+huM dza tha/ gr-i h+Na tha sa ma ya rak+Sha tha ma ma sarba a the/ ha sa yaM/ ku ro tha/ a tra/ sA d+ha ni/ yi shra traSh+Ta shaM/ rak+Sha sarbaM/ ar+thaM/ ya thai baM/ ya theSh+TaM/ b+huM ja tha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ pi ba tha/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba sa pa ri/ sa ta su khaM bi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ yi ka b+ha ban+tu/ oM AH hUM/

hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rol mo'i sgra dang rdo rje glu blangs te/ lhag ma'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid dgyes rdor rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos 'byung nang du 'dab brgyad gsum/ /rim par dkar nag dmar po'o/ /de yang yig 'bru gsum las bsgom/ /lha dang phyogs skyong

klu chen brgyad/ /oM AH hUM las pad mdog bzhin/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdor dril 'chang / /rang gi yum yang de bzhin te/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis kun kyang gnas/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer spro/ /gzugs dang gzugs med lha brgyad la/ /'dod khams lha mi phyogs

skyong ste/ /ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin/ /klu chen brgyad la bstim par bya/ /bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis sku gsung thugs/ /rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te/ /phyi nang gsang bas mchod bya ste/ /lha dang phyogs skyong klu brgyad la/ /rnam snang

mi bskyod mtha' yas kyis/ /rim pa ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /de la sngags 'dis rab tu 'bul/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas blangs nas su/ /oM in+da ya ma dza la/ yak+Sha dzaH hUM baM hoH b+hU ta bah+ni/ bA yu/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da/ surdza mA ta/ pap+pa/ ta la/ pA tA la/ a Tha sap+pa swA hA/ i daM ba

liM b+huM dza/ dzi g+ha maM sa d+hU paM puSh+pe dI paM/ gan+d+he/ piM g+ha/ aM ba/ kats+tsha/ khan+ti/ khu Ni/ phe Ta/ ga da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harmANA/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta/ oM AH hUM swA hA/ rdo rje glu dang rol mo'i sgras/ /mchod de nyin mo lan gsum gtang / /yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod

pa'i rdzas la bsang gtor brlab/ /'dab brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la/ /mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas dmigs byas te/ /badzra DA ki ni/ siM gi ni/ byA g+h+ri ni/ dzaM bu gi ni/ lu ki ni/ DA ki ni/ dI pi ni/ tsu pi ni/ kaM po dzi ni/ brjod pa tsam gyis dmigs byas te/ /'dab brgyad la ni

mkha' 'gro ma/ /gru chad la ni khams gsum gyi/ /gtso bo thams cad bsam par bya/ /khyams la 'khor rnams thams cad do/ /oM AH hUM/ kun kyang sku gsung thugs dang ldan/ /b+ha ga'i phyag rgya mgo steng bca'/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nu t+pan+na rwAta/ spyan

drangs bstims la bar chod bgegs/ /'ong ba bsrung phyir 'di skad do/ /oM na maH saman+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NaM/ na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daM ShoT+T+a ka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu shU la paR+shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mr-i ta ku N+Da li/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+phog+sa ya/ sarba big+h+nA na bi nA ya nAM/ ma hA ka bi de/ bi bi tan+ta ka rA ya/ sarba gau rI u pa tha ba sa ma naM/ ku ru ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar bdud rtsis mtshams bcad nas/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas gtor ma

dbul/ /ba liM ga tha/ oM A ra li hoH dzaH hUM baM hoH/ badzraDA ki na maH sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dr-i sh+ya hoH/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba b+hU ta/ pre ta rAk+Sha sa/ pi shA tsa uSh+ma n+da a pa smar/ DA ki n+ye da ya/ i daM ba liM gr-i h+Nan+tu/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tshan+du/ sa ma yar k+Sha n+tu/ sa ma ya rak+Sh+n+tu/ ya tha baM/ ya theSheT/ b+huny+dza tha/ bi ba tha/

ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba pa ri pu ka /ta ta su ka bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ oM a kra bi kre/ sma sha ne pa/ parba de/ kan+d+ha re/ g+hu he gra me/ parba s+ye/ pa the/ khe dra/ sor+Na ma ka ra/ bi se sa ta ba dza ni/ thang la ga te bu mo/ ma taM ga ta/ bi se swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na ru tra/ ma hA ru tra/ de ba twata tra/ sa ma sred ta/ kre na kar

la pi pa dzi/ nan ta ti ta/ bi na ya ka /tsa muN+Di/ go ra pi pa tsi/ u ma de bi tu/ sta pa dza yash+tsa/ bi dza ya/ tsi bu ba/ a tsi ta/ a pa ra tsi ta/ dzi ka li/ kA ya b+ha bAn+tu/ oM AH maM hUM phaT swA hA/ de ltar phul te gsol ba dang / /se gol brdab cing gshegs su gsol/ /oM kr-i to ba sar+b+ba sa twAr+tha/

sid+d+hi ma dat+tA thA nu ga/ gats+tsha twAM bu d+d+hA bi Sha yaM/ pu ne re ga ma na yats+tsha/ rang rang gnas su yud tsam gyis/ /phyin te rnal 'byor bsgo ba nyan/ /de ltar mtshan mo lan gsum gtang / /yi dam lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lce la rdo rje bsgom byas te/ /lha'am chos nyid rol bsams na/ /

dngos grub rim par 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rol pa'i lhag ma la/ /shin tu lhag ma'i gtor ma bya/ /lte bar bdag nyid yi dam bsgom/ /pre ta brjod cing zur drug la/ /yi dags thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /oM u tsiSh+Ta a d+hi tiSh+Ta b+hU dza de bi tha hUM hUM phaT/ sdug bsngal

bral zhing tshim par bsam/ /sgrub pa'i zhag grangs thon pa dang / /slob ma'i mgo steng gtor ma gzhag /rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / /phrin las bzhi yi dbang thob bsam/ /sum mdo'am lam ka'i bzhi mdo'am/ /dur khrod yang na chu 'gram du/ /nam phyed na ni gtor ma

gtang / /byang shar mtshams su gtor chen bskyal/ /mdor na gnas pa'i go rims kyis/ /skyel ba'i sa ru phyin pa dang / /phyogs phyogs gdon rnams zil mnan phyir/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas te/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol/ /lag pa g.yon nas g.yas su

bsgyur/ /rkang pa g.yon nas g.yas su brdab/ /lag pa brkyang ste 'phyang zhing 'phur/ /long mo gshibs te 'gying bag gis/ /'gyur zhing g.yon du bgrad cing blta/ /rang sngags gdon cing dgye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i glu yang drag tu blang / /rol mo'i sgra yang drag tu brdung / /'di

ni mkhas pa rnams kyi gzhung / /rgyud rnams dang ni 'gal ba med/ /gdams ngag rim pa 'di bris pas/ /lhag chad nor ba ci mchis pa/ /dkon mchog bla ma chos skyong dang / /mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ /rmongs pa rnams la mig phye bas/ /las kyi gzhung bsrangs

dge rtsa gang / /bdag dang rnal 'byor thams cad dang / /sems can kun gyi don du bsngo/ /slob dpon chen po kha che rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba b+hU ta ba liM bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga

zhes bya ba/ dpal kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e waM rnam par nges bzhugs pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpar phyag bya ste/ /rnam 'tshe log 'dren la sogs las/ /sems can bsrung phyir gtor ma brtsam/ /kye yi rdo rjer ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom bya ba/ /chos kyi

'byung gnas nang du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad sum brtsegs la/ /dkar nag dmar po'i oM hUM AH/ /rim par lha chen brgyad dang ni/ /phyogs srung brgyad dang klu chen brgyad/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar bskyed bya ste/ /mdun du dbang phyug chen po bskyed/ /g.yas su lha yi dbang bo bsam/ /

rgyab tu tshangs pa bskyed bya ste/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su khyab 'jug go/ /me ru 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bskyed/ /srin por tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ /b+h+r-iM gi ri ti rlung mtshams su/ /dbang ldan mtshams su karti ka /mdun gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam/ /g.yas su mthar

byed dgod par bya'o/ /chu lha rgyab kyi 'dab ma la'o/ /de ltar g.yon du nor sbyin dgod/ /me yi mtshams su me lha che/ /bden bral du ni srin po'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su rlung lha'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams su 'byung po'i bdag /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /mtha' yas nor rgyas

de bzhin te/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang / /pad chen shin tu pad chen po/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag na 'chang / /rang 'od rig mas yang dag 'khyud/ /gdan la g.yas brkyang pa yis bzhugs/ /rang rang thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od zer

lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas/ /lha chen brgyad la gzugs khams dang / /gzugs med gnas pa'i lha bsdu'o/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi/ /phyogs srung brgyad la rab tu bsdu/ /ngan 'gro gsum dang lha ma yin/ /klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya/ /rang bzhin gnas la

bzhugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor ba rnams spyan drang phyir/ /gau rI yis ni dgug byas la/ /tsau rI yis ni zhags pas bcings/ /be tA lI yis lcags sgrog bsdam/ /dril bus mnyes byed g+hasma rI/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thugs ka nas/ /'od zer lcags kyu ltar 'phros nas/ /phyogs

bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgug /de la phyi nang gsang mchod de/ /de rnams kyis ni dbang bskur mthar/ /rang rang bdag pos dbu la brgyan/ /lha chen brgyad la rtag pa yis/ /rdo rje yis ni phyogs skyong brgyad/ /gar dbang gis ni klu chen brgyad/ /de la cho gas gtor ma bsgrub/ /

rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor las/ /AH las byung ba'i pad snod bsam/ /der ni b+h+rUM AM dzr-IM khaM hUM/ /go ku da ha na las ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang sems can lnga/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bar du bsam/ /nyi dbus hUM byung rdo rje ste/ /'bar ba dang ni spros pa yis/ /'chi med rab tu bsgrub

par bya/ /nang gi rang bzhin 'di bsgoms nas/ /oM AH hUM gis byin brlabs dbul/ /de nas gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags/ /oM in+da/ dza ma/ dza la/ dzak+Sha/b+hU ta/ bah+ni/ ba u/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da/ sru dz+dza/ mA ma/ pap+pa/ ta la/ pA tA li/ AH g+ha srA hA/ de ni gtor ma'i mgron no/ /

i daM/ ba liM/ b+hu ny+dza/ dzi g+ha/ phul+la/ d+hU p+pa/ mAM sa/ baM g+ha/ de ni gsol bar zhu ba'o/ /am+ba sarba kAdz+dza sA d+ha khan+ti khu N+Ni pheT gang / de ni don zhu ba'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM/ Ad+ya nu t+pan+na tA ta/ oM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ de ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /de nas dgyes par

byas nas gshegs su gsol/ yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra sa tra twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+ya me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+ya me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karmasu ts+tsha me/ tsit+taM shre yaH/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga bAn/

sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH/ gtor ma 'di sbyin zhing rab tu mchod par byed na/ rnal 'byor ba la 'byung po thams cad kyis legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de tshe de la bde ba rnyog pa med pa nyid dang / lha mnyes pa dang / 'khor dge bar 'gyur ro/ /gal

te 'byung po'i tshogs de la gtor ma byin na/ dbang dang mngon spyod dang dgra'i sde gzhig pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde ba dang / rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

lo tsA ba shA kya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ he badzra sA d+ha no pi ka /bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal he ru ka la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes gnyis med rgyu dang bral/ /de bzhin tshogs bral gang gi gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag 'tshal te/ /de bsten cho ga bstan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don ldan sgrub pa pos/ /yang dag don ldan dam tshig dang / /phyi nang gsang ba'i sdom pa shes/

slob dpon gsang dang shes rab dang / /de bzhin bzhi pa'i dbang ldan pas/ /bsgom pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par 'gyur/ /shing gcig drung ngam dur khrod du/ /bsgom pa dag ni dge bar gsungs/ /yang na dben zhing dgon pa dang / /ma mo'i gnas la sogs de

bzhin/ /yang na bde zhing nyams dga' bar/ /rang gi 'dod pa bsgrub par bya/ /der ni bde zhing rgya che ba'i/ /stan la rnam par 'dug nas ni/ /me tog la sogs bye brag dang / /bdud rtsi yis ni bsang gtor bya/ /rdo rjes mkha' snying dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam

par bya/ /de la hUM yig 'bar ba yis/ /mtshon cha mchog ni spro bar bya/ /mkha' dbyings til gang bzhin rgyas pa'i/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor mchog bkug ste/ /rang snying sa bon mchog skyes pa'i/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /gau rI zla ba'i mtshan ma dang / /tsau rI nyi ma'i snod

'dzin te/ /be tA lI yi lag na chu'o/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin te/ /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'o/ /sa ba rI ni de bzhin bcud/ /tsaN+DalI ni rnge chung 'khrol/ /Dom+bi chags chen rjes chags pas/ /snying gar yongs su 'khyud pa ste/ /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /de rjes bsod nams yan

lag go/ /gsum gyi skyabs 'gro sogs bya ste/ /'di ltar phyag 'tshal skyabs 'gro dang / /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dang / /dam bca' bdag lus dbul bar bya/ /de nas dang por byams pa ste/ /de rjes snying rje rnam par

bsgom/ /gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms so/ /de nas ye shes blta ba'i phyir/ /phyi dang nang gi dngos 'di kun/ /rnam dag stong par rnam dpyad de/ /sprin med nam mkha' ltar bsams nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA

dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /sems brtan byed pa'i gsang sngags 'dis/ /stong pa nyid las sems kyi dngos/ /a haM o dang ldan pa ni/ /oM dbus haM gis 'brel pa las/ /raM la nyi ma bdun bsams te/ /de la hUM las byung ba yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje des kyang ra

ba dang / /dra ba 'ching ba'ang bsgom par bya/ /de dbus mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyis/ /shes rab e gzugs bsgom par bya/ /de steng sa dang chu dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /ljang gu dkar po dmar po dang / /du ba'i mdog tu bsam par bya/ /gru bzhi zlum po gru

gsum dang / /zla kham dbyibs su rnam par bsam/ /de steng oM ldan a haM ni/ /bdag nyid ngo bo gnas bsams te/ /e gzugs nas ni a haM bar/ /thams cad 'dres gyur 'khor lor 'gyur/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed

yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs brgyan pa'o/ /de stengs chos dbyings bdag nyid kyi/ /ro ni mkhas pas rab bsgoms te/ /de la A li kA li las/ /'byung ba nyi ma zla ba bsam/ /de dag rab tu sa bon ni/ /a dang hUM las gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje gri gug bsgom par bya/ /

de la rang sems bdag nyid kyi/ /a haM yongs su zhugs pa ni/ /dam pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems dpar 'di de brjod pa'o/ /de rnams gcig tu 'dres pa las/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ /he ru kar ni rnam par bsgom/ /zla ba me long ye shes te/ /de

bzhin nyi ma mnyam pa nyid/ /sa bon las byung mtshan ma ni/ /so sor rtog par gsungs pa'o/ /dbyer med 'dres pa nan tan te/ /skur gyur chos dbyings ye shes yin/ /sku mdog sngo rengs shar ba'i 'od/ /bin+du dmar po 'dra ba'i spyan/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'khyil/ /phyag

rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo snyan cha phyag gdub dang / /mgur chu dang ni ske rags rnams/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni dag pa yis/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags/ /lo grangs bcu drug lta bu la/ /rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can/ /g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang / /gnyis

pa yum gyi bdag nyid kyis/ /kha T+wAM ga yang 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje nag po ste/ /hUM gi sgra 'byin bdag nyid can/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /gal te phyag rgya byed 'dod na/ /g.yon gyi dang po ka pA la/ /lha dang lha min khrag gis bkang / /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /

lhag pa'i phyag gnyis ji lta ba/ /rang dang 'dra ba'i phag mos 'khyud/ /gzhan yang sngon nyid ji lta ba'o/ /gzhan yang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni skya rengs 'dra/ /g.yon pa dmar po gcer bu ste/ /g.yon gyi dang po tri shU la/ /g.yas kyi dang po

rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa gnyis pa dril bu dang / /g.yas pa gnyis pa karta ri/ /lhag mas rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /gri dang thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud/ /gzhan ni sngo bzhin yum de bzhin/ /gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba ni/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par

brgyan/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis rnam par mnan/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam brgyan cing / /nyi ma la bzhugs gar gyis stabs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'chang / /kha dog nag po 'jigs par byed/ /rang zhal nas ni hUM 'phro zhing / /sku

la thal bas rnam par byugs/ /bdag med ma dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dga' ba'i sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug /rnam par mi rtog bde ba yi/ /mi rtog rang bzhin bde bar gnas/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa me tog kun+da 'dra/ /dpa' bo g.yon pa dmar ba che/ /steng gi

zhal ni rnam par gtsigs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan dang ldan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba 'dra/ /g.yas kyi 'bar ba'i phyag brgyad na/ /pad+ma b+han+d+ha brgyad nang du/ /glang po rta dang bong bu dang / /ba lang rnga mo mi dag dang / /byi la dang ni seng ge rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /sa dang

chu dang rlung dang me/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin yang / /gshin rje dang ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /g.yon gyi b+han+d+ha brgyad du'o/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang mi sdug dang / /rgod dang khro dang 'jigs par byed/ /snying rje ngo mtshar zhi la sogs/ /'bar ba'i gar dgu nyams dang ldan/ /zhabs kyis sa la

brdabs mdzad cing / /lha min lha la bsdigs mdzad pa'i/ /rang gi snying gar ra yig las/ /byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /ngo bo nyid kyi hUM yig go/ /rdo rje yi ge hUM las byung / /kha dog nag po drag po che/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /

de nyid hUM du bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang hUM yig yongs gyur pa'i/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje las byung nag po che/ /'dam skyes sngon po rab 'dra ba'i/ /yang na sngo rengs shar ba 'dra/ /dad pas nges par bsgom par bya/ /de nas gzhal yas yid 'ong pa'i/ /

ma mo'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste/ /yab yum gnyis su med pa yi/ /yid 'ong sbyor ba'i dgyes pa las/ /byung ba'i gau rI dbang po'i phyogs/ /shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las/ /byung ba'i tsau rI yang spros te/ /lho phyogs sgo skyong tsau rI gnas/ /'jam

po 'jug pa sbyor ba las/ /be tA lI yang dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas bdud 'joms nub sgor ro/ /snyoms 'jug sbyor ba chen po las/ /g+hasma rI yang dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas byang gi sgo ru ni/ /khro mo'i gzugs su rnam par gnas/ /gnyis sprad pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /puk+ka sI yang

dbyung bar bya/ /spros nas dbang ldan grwa ru ni/ /'khrug pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas/ /gzhan yang gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /sha ba rI ni me yi grwa /tsaN+DalI ni srin po'i phyogs/ /Dom+bi rlung gi grwa ru'o/ /gau rI g.yas na gri gug ste/ /g.yon pa na ni de bzhin nya/ /tsau rI g.yas

na rnge'u chung ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa'o/ /pe tA lI g.yas rus sbal te/ /g.yon na pad+ma b+han+d+ha'o/ /g+hasma rI ni g.yas na sbrul/ /g.yon pa na ni rnal 'byor snod/ /puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin dgra sta'o/ /sa ba rI g.yas dge slong ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin

bsreg shang ngo / /tsaN+DalI g.yas 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pa na ni de bzhin gshol/ /Dom+bi g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /g.yon na de bzhin sdigs 'dzub po/ /gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis gsungs/ /skyil krung phyed ma gar gyi stab sa/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga

yis rnam par brgyan/ /gau rI sku mdog nag por 'gyur/ /tsau rI btsod dang 'dra ba ste/ /be tA lI ni gser btso ma/ /g+hasma markata lta bu ste/ /puk+ka in+d+ra nI la 'dra/ /zla 'od lta bu'i sa pa rI/ /tsaN+DalI ni nam mkha'i mdog /Dom+bi sna tshogs dag tu bshad/ /tshangs dang dbang bo nye

dbang po/ /drag po gshin rje gnod sbyin dang / /bden bral na ni thags bzangs ris/ /gau rI la sogs lha mo yi/ /rim bzhin gdan du shes par bya/ /de rnams sa bon 'di yin no/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM saM laM DaM/ /bdag pos sa bon 'di dag las/ /de

rnams gdon pa nyid du bya/ /de nas rang gi rig ma dang / /rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dod chags ches/ /'od du zhu bar gyur pa las/ /mtshams kyi lha mo bshes gnyen mos/ /sna tshogs glu yis mchod de bskul/ /kye yi rdo rje thugs rjes gzigs te puk+ka bdag la skyobs/ /bde ba chen po sbyar

ba bdag 'dod stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal te bzhengs su gsol/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin bsal nas sa yi dngos grub dgos don du/ /gal te gson par mchis bzhed kye yi rdo rje bzhengs su gsol/ /tsaN+Da bdag gis khyod med phyogs ma mthong nas gsol 'debs na/ /lha la sogs

pa'i 'jig rten bsgral bar dam bcas ci slad bzhugs/ /bdag ni Do m+bi'i mtshan ma med pa khyod kyi sems ni shes pa ste/ /thugs rje med pa de mi rung bas rdzu 'phrul lta bur bzhengs su gsol/ /de dag gsan nas sngon bzhin du/ /AH hUM dag las rdo rje 'dzin/ /chen po 'od du zhu las

bzhengs/ /de nas zhe sdang bdag nyid kyi/ /rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'bar ba nag po lcags kyu yis/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /spyan drangs ma mo brgyad rnams kyis/ /sngon bzhin mchod de gsol ba gdab/ /bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan

'das/ /bcom ldan rnams kyis dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la dbang bskur rab tu stsol/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sa rba badzra ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na/ de skad gsol ba btab pa yis/ /bde gshegs de dag thams cad kun/ /he ru ka yi skur gyur

te/ /bde gshegs lnga yi bdag nyid kyi/ /bdud rtsi bum pas dbang bskur te/ /de tshe me tog gur gum char/ /'bab dang rnga yi sgra grag cing / /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma sogs dang / /spyan sogs rdo rje dbyangs rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur rab tu byas pa yis/ /thugs kyi dbang phyug

sogs sangs rgyas/ /dbu rgyan du ni gyur par bya/ /mi bskyod rtag dang rin chen dbang / /mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /puk+ka sI sogs mtshams gnas pa/ /rim pa bzhin du rgya yis gdab/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang / /'dod chags rdo rje ma yis ni/ /sgo

gnas kai ri la sogs pa/ /rim bzhin du ni gdab par bya/ /rgya yi gdab cing mtshan pas na/ /des 'dir rgyas zhes bya ba yin/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhug byas te/ /bdud rtsi myang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de dag tshim pa nyid du bya/ /rlung dang

me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zla gam gru gsum kha dog gnyis/ /yi ge yaM dang raM gyis mtshan/ /ba dan dang ni rdo rjes mdzes/ /de steng b+han+d+ha a las byung / /der ni ye shes bdud rtsis bkang / /yi ge hUM las rab bskyed pa'i/ /rdo rje las byung oM gyis mtshan/ /de nyid gsum gyis

byin brlabs pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lha yi sbyor bas bsang / /mchod dang bstod pa nyid du bya/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin shes par bya/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes phung por ni/ /rdo rje ma dang gau rI dang / /chu yi lha mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /bdag med rnal 'byor mar dag

go/ /sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi/ /puk+ka sI la sogs pa'i dngos/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos/ /gau rI tsau rI be tA lI/ /g+hasma sa spyod mkha' spyod do/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyi dbang po ni/ /gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang / /'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje dang / /

bdag med rnal 'byor mar shes bya/ /'khor lo snyan cha mgur chu dang / /phyag gdub ska rags phyag rgya lnga/ /mi bskyod mtha' yas rin chen dbang / /snang mdzad don grub bdag nyid do/ /phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab ste/ /phyag bzhi bdud bzhi rnam par dag /phyag drug pha rol

phyin drug go/ /bcu drug phyag tu gsungs pa ni/ /stong pa bcu drug bdag nyid do/ /zhal gcig stong pa nyid kyi sgo/ /zhal gsum rnam par thar pa gsum/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi dag pa nyid/ /spyan ni dag pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /dbang po drug

dang phung po lnga/ /skye mched drug dang 'byung ba rnams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag pas/ /sna tshogs dag cing rnam par grol/ /gzugs yul la sogs gang gi yang / /rnal 'byor pa yis mig yor tshul/ /thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ /sangs rgyas rdzu

'phrul sna tshogs so/ /rnam par dag pa byas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa'i bdag nyid dang / /phyi nang bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /de la 'di ni sdom pa ste/ /e waM ma yA'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'khor lo bzhi ni lus la gnas/ /'di ltar sprul pa'i chos dang ni/ /longs spyod bde chen

'khor lo rnams/ /lte ba snying ga mgul pa dang / /spyi bor rim bzhin shes par bya/ /'khor lo rnams kyi pad+ma ni/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad/ /bcu drug sum cu gnyis su shes/ /sa bon oM dang hUM dang ni/ /oM dang haM ste rim bzhin no/ /A li kA li sprul pa la/ /yongs su

bskor bar shes par bya/ /bde gshegs yab yum sa bon gyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin bskor/ /yi ge i e 'dren bcas pas/ /longs spyod 'khor lo bskor pa yin/ /sprul pa'i sku dang chos kyi sku/ /de bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /sku gsum yongs su shes pa

rnams/ /'khor lo bzhi ru 'dod pa yin/ /'khor lo 'di rnams rang bzhin ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi/ /yi ge 'bru bzhir 'dod pa ste/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI/ /dkar mo sgrol ma de bzhin du/ /las dang chos dang dam tshig dang / /phyag rgya chen por brjod pa'o/ /yi ge

e dang waM dag dang / /ma dang yA yang 'di yi dngos/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs rnams dang / /A li kA li'ang 'di nyid yin/ /ye shes skad cig bzhir grags pa/ /sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang / /rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral/ /'khyud dang myong dang spyod pa dang / /ci yang

ma yin pa yi sems/ /'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yin/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam/ /phung po nyon mongs bzhi 'byin pa/ /bden pa bzhi yang 'di nyid do/ /bdag dang sngags dang lha dang ni/ /ye shes rnams kyi de nyid rnams/ /rang rang yang dag gang yin pa'am/ /

'khor lo bzhi yi ngo bo'o/ /dga' dang dam pa'i dga' ba dang / /bral dang rang bzhin dga' ba rnams/ /bde ba'i ye shes cha bzhi ste/ /drod thob pa dang 'phel ba dang / /chags bral bde dang mi gnyis bde/ /de yang 'khor lo bzhi la gnas/ /gnas brtan thams cad yod par smra/ /

de bzhin mang pos bkur ba dang / /dge 'dun phal chen sde zhes pa/ /sde pa bzhi yang de nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa dang / /ye shes sdom pa'ang bstan par bya/ /sme sha lte bar 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs lnga bsregs pa dang / /spyan la sogs pa bsregs pa

dang / /haM bsregs zla ba 'bab pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /rnal 'byor gsang sngags sdom pa yis/ /bsreg pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /bsreg pa me dang rlung yin te/ /ye shes me yi snang ba gang / /las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yin/ /las kyang bcom ldan shes rab ma'i/ /

rlung gi de nyid 'di yin te/ /lte ba'i dbus las 'phro zhing phra/ /chos dang longs spyod bde chen bzhi/ /brtan dang g.yo ba kun gyi bdag /yi ge aM gi bdag nyid ni/ /las kyi rlung gi gzhi yin te/ /'di las kun du 'byung ba yin/ /'di dag rgyu ba'i rim pa ni/ /nyi ma gcig la thun bzhi ste/ /de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis/ /

rim pa bcu drug de bzhin du/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha dang ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /A li kA li'i ngo bo ni/ /sna bug g.yas dang g.yon du rgyu/ /de yang sa dang chu dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /'byung ba bzhi yi ngo bor 'dod/ /

'di rnams dus su rgyu ba ste/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin du sa ma yin/ /lci zhing mkhrang ba sa yi khams/ /thur du rgyu ba dang por 'dod/ /grang zhing rtsub pa chu yi khams/ /mdun du rgyu ba gnyis pa yin/ /dro zhing 'jam pa me yi khams/ /'di ni phyir la nye bar rgyu/ /yang zhing stobs can rlung

gi khams/ /gyen du rgyu bar shes par bya/ /de bzhin chu tshod rim pa dang / /thun zhes bya bar grags pa yang / /'dir ni 'di nyid gzung bya ste/ /g.yas su ji bzhin g.yon de bzhin/ /de nas kyang ni g.yas yin te/ /bar chad yod pa ma yin no/ /dus min rgyu ba gang zhe na/ /

gang zhig 'chi ba'i dus nyid dang / /byang chub sems rgyun 'bab pa dang / /nad chen 'byung ba'i snga ltas la/ /de dag dus gcig 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni nam mkha'i khams su brjod/ /rlung dang ye shes rnam shes dang / /dug rnams lhan cig rgyu ba ste/ /nams kyang

'bral ba ma yin no/ /reg pa'i rlung zhes bya ba ni/ /lus las nam yang mi 'da' ste/ /gal te 'das na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid shes pa yis/ /me yi de nyid bskul bar bya/ /dbugs dang drod kyi khams dag kyang / /tha dad 'jug pa ma yin no/ /de la me yi de nyid ni/ /

dbang po gtsubs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /ji ltar phyi rol me bzhin no/ /de yang dbang po'i lam nas ni/ /lte ba'i rtsa ru rab tu 'bar/ /'od chen du bar bcas pa yis/ /tsaN+DalI ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ye shes me yi snang ba de/ /shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa dang / /

chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i/ /bde gshegs lnga dang de bzhin du/ /lha mor bcas pa tshig par 'gyur/ /longs spyod 'khor lo byung nas ni/ /g.yas nas bskor ba lan gsum byas/ /smin phrag mdzod spur byung nas kyang / /de nas rna ba g.yas su byung / /phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas bskul byas nas/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu zhugs par gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la babs te/ /shin tu tshig par gyur pa 'di/ /sngags kyi sdom par 'dod pa yin/ /ye shes sdom pa'i bye brag ni/ /snying gar sangs rgyas bka' ba gros nas/ /rnam dag bdud rtsi bsdus byas te/ /

sngon gyi lam nas byung nas kyang / /phyogs bcu bdud rtsi bsdu byas te/ /sngon bzhin haM la zhugs gyur pas/ /sems kyi zla ba zhu nas ni/ /so yi sbu gu nas byung nas/ /longs spyod 'khor lor babs par gyur/ /der ni cung zad ngal so nas/ /sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni/ /chos kyi

'khor lor babs par gyur/ /bde bar gshegs rnams gang bar byas/ /sngon bzhin phyir yang bskor nas ni/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor babs par gyur/ /de bzhin kun du 'gro bar byed/ /skra yi rtse mo 'bum gyi cha/ /ye shes snang ba'i bye brag dag /mig gis mthong ba ma yin no/ /'di ni

sdom par brjod pa'o/ /nang gi bzlas pa bstan pa ni/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /gru gsum gnas ni de bzhin me/ /lto ba chu yi dkyil 'khor te/ /de steng dbang chen ri rab bcas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rtag pa'i 'khor lo bsgom bya ste/ /de la mi gnyis bdag nyid

kyi/ /yi ge a yi sdom pa gzung / /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /lus dang ngag yid gang yang min/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug min/ /kha dog dbyibs sogs ma yin zhing / /khro zhi la sogs rnam par spangs/ /mtshan ma kun dang bral ba yi/ /dbu ma chen po bsgom par bya/ /

gzhan ni sdom pa ji lta ba'o/ /'di ni ci yang ma yin phyir/ /ma ning bzlas pa zhes 'dod de/ /bzlas pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /gal te skyo bar gyur na ni/ /phyi rol bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes sems dpa'i gnas nyid dang / /sku gsung thugs

kyi gnas rnams nas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa spro bar bya/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ he badzra gyi snying po'o/ /oM trai lokyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i'o/ /oM

aSh+TA na nA ye/ phiM gor+d+ha ke sha brta ma ne/ tsa tu rbiM sha ti ni trA ya sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya kr-ish+Na dzI mU ta wa pu She ka pA lA mA la a ne kaM d+ha ri Ne A d+ham ta krU ra tsiT+Ta' ya/ /ar+d+hen du daM sh+TI Ne mA ra ya mA ra ya/ /kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gardza ya gardza ya/ /tardza ya tardza ya/ /sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sa pha sA ga rA na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ /nA ga

aSh+Ta kAn/ gr-ihaN gr-ihaN/ sha trUM ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM haH phaT swA hA/ /phyag bcu drug pa'i'o/ /bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil byas te/ /mchod dang bstod dang smon lam dag/ /legs par btab ste phyag rgya dgrol/ /dbyings su bsdu dang gshegs gsol ba/ /

ji lta ji bzhin bya ba yin/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /spyod lam kun du lha nyid kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin las nyams mi bya/ /'di ltar nyal ba'i tshe na yang / /rdo rje 'dzin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /chags chen rjes su chags byas te/ /ye shes me yis lus zhu nas/ /chos sku sems

su gyur par nyal/ /gang tshe ldang ba'i tshe na yang / /tshad med bzhi yis bskul ba yis/ /sngon gyi smon lam rjes dran nas/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /ting 'dzin rim par ldang bar bya/ /gang zhig za ba'i tshe na yang / /sdom pa'i dngos po ji lta ba'i/ /lus

ni lha yi dkyil 'khor te/ /zas ni bdud rtsir byin brlab bya/ /zos pas dbyer med tshim par bya/ /yang na sbyin sreg mchod pa bya/ /ra sa ya na me yi khams/ /g.yas su 'bar zhing 'phro ba ste/ /A li'i ngo bor shes par bya/ /la la nA ni rlung gi khams/ /g.yon du gtsubs shing g.yo ba

ste/ /kA li'i ngo bor shes par bya/ /de dbus lus kyi bdag nyid la/ /bza' sogs 'o ma'i sbyin sreg bya/ /gal te 'gro 'chag byed pa na/ /rigs lnga rnams la bslang ba dang / /phyag rgya la sogs rgyan rnams dang / /rdo rje thos pa'i spyod pa dag /ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin bya/ /

'dis ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ /gal te gtor ma gtong 'dod na/ /he ru ka yi sbyor ba yis/ /'byung po la ni mngon dmigs te/ /zas rnams bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas/ /sngags 'di yis ni tshim par bya/ /oM in+da/ dzam/ dzal/ dz+kakha/ b+hU ta/ bah+ni/ ba u/ rak+sha/ tsand/

sudz+dza/ mA da/ pap+pa/ pAtA ye/ aSh+Tha sap+pa swA hA/ e daM/ ba liM/ b+huM dza/ dzi g+ha/ phul+la/ d+hUp+pa/ mAM sa/ biM g+ha/ am+ba/ kadz+dza/ sA d+ha/ khAn+ti/ khu Ni/ pheT/ gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM/ A n+ya nu t+pan+na twA ta/ oM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ gang zhig rtag tu 'du byed pa/ /las rnams thams cad

'grub pa dang / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams dga' nas ni/ /de la dngos grub myur bar 'gyur/ /las rnams dag gi mjug tu yang / /mchod dang bstod cing smon lam gdab/ /de la smon lam 'di yin te/ /rigs ldan skye zhing blo gros rjes su ldan/ /dam tshig ldan zhing kye yi rdo rje ston/ /

snying rje ldan zhing bla ma rnams la gus/ /skye ba kun du 'di ltar skye gyur cig /rdo rje dril bu lag gis 'khrol byed cing / /zab mo'i dam chos rab tu klog pa dang / /dam tshig btsun mo'i khu ba za byed par/ /skye ba kun du 'di ltar skye gyur cig /de nas sprul pa rang la bsdu/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor

slar gshegs gsol/ /spyod lam la sogs sngon bzhin du'o/ /slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ he badzra'i sgrub thabs he ru ka mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na dang / rong zom d+harma b+ha dras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la

phab pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI he badzra nA ma sA d+ha no pi ka /bod skad du/ dpal kye'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab thabs dag bdag nyid can/ /kye rdor bdag med ma la yang / /bla

mar bcas la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rim pa gsum pa'i sgrub thabs brtsam/ /mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang / /bla ma dga' bsten rnyed par dka'/ /bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul/ /'gro phan lam la brten par gyis/ /yon tan ldan zhing brtson par ldan/ /bla mar gus shing

dad ldan pa/ /rgyal ba'i chos la the tshom med/ /dbang dang dbye ba nges tshig las/ /snod yin phyir na drin sbyin bya/ /chu sogs bum pa'i dbang bskur dang / /rim bzhin gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang / /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur la/ /de srid bla ma'i man ngag mtha'/ /yid du

'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /ri dang nags tshal dang ni phug /chu 'gram bzhi mdo mtsho dang ni/ /shing gcig dben pa dur khrod rnams/ /bsam gtan khang pa byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi sogs kyis byug par bya/ /bris sku sogs mchod dgram byas la/ /nang par sngar langs sems

bdag nyid/ /phyi rol khrus sogs kun byas la/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /sbyong byed dag pa la sogs kyis/ /'dod pa'i lha ni bsgrub par bya/ /bla ma rdo rje can bsams nas/ /sems kyi rin chen las byung ba'i/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni spros byas la/ /de nas rim bzhin

dbul bar bya/ /de nas lha mo brgyad kyis mchod/ /gau rI byang chub sems kyis mchod/ /tsau rI rang byung me tog gis/ /mi bskyod 'dzin pa be+e tA lI/ /snang mdzad kyis mchod g+hasma rI/ /puk+ka sI yis lcags kyus mchod/ /sA ba rI ni ro 'dzin te/ /tsaN+DalI ni rnge chung 'dzin/ /Dom+bis

gnyis med sbyor ba byed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /kye rdor shes rab bdag nyid can/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang byas pa/ /bdag gzhan don du ma lus par/ /so sor bshags

shing slar yang ni/ /mi bgyid pa yi sdom pa nod/ /bde gshegs kun gyi bsod nams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams la/ /yang dag nyid du yi rang ngo / /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /bdag gis de la bskul ba ni/ /sems

can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /sems can sangs rgyas thob bar du/ /rgyal ba de nyid bzhugs nas ni/ /nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol bar 'tshal/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la/ /byang chub lam ni ston pa po/ /

bsod nams kun gyi 'byung gnas che/ /byang chub rnams kyang de bzhin bskyed/ /lus ngag yid kyi bsod nams ni/ /bgyis sam bgyid du stsal ba dang / /rjes su yi rang gang ci'ang rung / /des na 'jig rten kun mkhyen shog /snying rje rlan gyis brlan sems kyis/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas

bzhi ni/ /dang po byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnam par bsgom/ /gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi mtha' nas btang snyoms so/ /dngos rnams bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /bdag kyang ye shes sems dpa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' nA da'i bar/ /de

nyid smig rgyu sgyu mar mtshungs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM A ni mi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las/ /skye ba nyid du mos par bya'o/ /kaM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hUM las

sna tshogs rdo rje sa bon dang ldan pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bdud rnams btul nas/ dra ba dang ra ba dang sa gzhir gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa dkar po bsams la/ de'i steng du paM las sna tshogs pad+ma/ khaM las sna tshogs

rdo rje/ de'i steng du laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ljang gu/ der baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po/ de las raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po/ der yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs 'dra ba nag po/ de la thig le dang ldan par bsams nas/

de rnams gcig tu gyur pas/ gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs bzhi dang / ka ba brgyad dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / rin po che dang 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pas spras pa/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor der srog song ba dang bcas pas

sems las grub par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i lte bar A li las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes/ der kA li las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ de'i dbus su hUM dang aM las rdo rje dang / gri gug sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes/ thams cad gcig tu gyur

pa bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes/ sku rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pas shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa spyan gsum pa dbu la thod pa lngas brgyan cing / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa dbu

skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod pa rlon pa lnga bcu rtsa bzhis do shal byas pa/ gcer bu g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /bdag med ma ni gri gug dang thod pa bsnams shing sku la 'khyud pa/ skyes pa'i thod pas do shal byas shing g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam

par bya ste/ gzhan ni thabs dang 'dra/ nang du yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna la ser sna rdo rje/ lce la 'dod chags rdo rje/ lus la phrag dog rdo rje/ yid la bdag med ma bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od

zer nag po lcags kyu'i dbyibs can spros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ mchod yon la sogs pas mchod nas/ dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug ste gnyis su med par bsam par bya'o/ /yang 'od zer des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad he ru

ka'i gzugs kyis spyan drangs nas/ de la mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste/ bdag la byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur nas/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam par bya ste/ ji srid du mi skyo'i bar du rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /skyon bzlas pa bya ste/ rig ma'i snying gar nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su gri gug sa bon dang bcas par bsams la/ de la sngags kyi phreng ba kun da 'dra ba 'od zer dang ldan pa byung nas rang gi zhal du zhugs te/ gsang ba'i rdo rjer byung nas/ lha mo'i pad+mar babs te/ lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de

bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam par bya'o/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag gis gsang ba'i rdo rje dang pad+mar bzlas pa bya'o/ /brtag pa bcu drug pa las/ ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur/ /phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi/ /

yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas yang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste/ lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po'i dbus su rang rig pa'i bdag nyid rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang na gnas par bsam mo/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo

'dab ma bcu drug pa thig le dang ldan pa/ mgrin par longs spyod kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o/ /mgo bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa dkar po de'i dbus su lhag pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od dang ldan par bsam par byas

nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo las 'od zer 'phros nas chos kyi 'khor lo dang longs spyod kyi 'khor lo nas yar song ste/ bde ba chen po la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mdzod spu nas phyung ste/ sems can thams cad sbyangs nas bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ye shes

kyi bdud rtsi drangs nas/ tshangs pa'i sgor zhugs te gzung 'dzin dang bral nas/ za ma tog tu babs par bsam pa ste/ de la rtse gcig tu bya'o/ /mi gsal na yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na bdag med ma rang gi snying gar bsdu/ rang yang hUM la bsdu/ de yang thig le 'od dang ldan par bsam

par bya ste/ gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugs su ni/ /rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongs su bsgom/ /dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems ngo bo/ ldang ba na yang bdag dang gzhan 'khor lo 'am/ tsaN+DalIr mos par bya ste/ mchod pa la sogs pa yang mi bya'o/ /de yang /

phyag rgya bcing ba rnam par spangs/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi 'tshal/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las/ /rmi lam du yang mi bya'o/ /zhes gur las gsungs so/ /mchod rten brtsig par mi bya ste/ /de bzhin mchod sogs mi bya'o/ /gtsug

lag dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi dgos pa rnyed par dka'/ /zhes gdan bzhi pa las gsungs so/ /de nas yang lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya'o/ /gang tshe ye shes rlung gis ni/ /rang rig dag ni bskyod nas su/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsregs pa yis/ /dga' ba la sogs

rim bzhin skye/ /ci 'dra ba ni skye zhe na/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba/ /lkugs pa'i dga' ba ji lta ba'o/ /gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /thog ma tha ma dbus med cing / /'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /bdag nyid gzhan nyid yod ma yin/ /'di ni mchog tu bde ba yin/ /bdag med

ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan nges par rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam skyon bral lhan cig skyes/ /thams cad lus la rang bzhin gnas/ /dga' ba dang po 'khor ba'i gzugs/ /de bzhin mchog dga' 'khor ba nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba 'khor bdag nyid/ /gsum la

lhan cig skyes pa med/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba la sogs pa/ /gsum pa spangs par gyur na ni/ /bzhi pa gang las skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas gsum po thabs byas te/ /bzhi pa bsgom par bya ba yin/ /rtsa ba'i rgyu ni gsum du gyis/ /de yi 'bras bu

bzhi pa yin/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum gyis spangs/ /yang na rang gis gsum pa yin/ /dga' ba'i bye brag tu shes bya/ /'khor lo rnams kyi rim pa'o/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so/ /dang po bum pa'i dbang yin te/ /mchog gi dga' ba gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes

rab ye shes dbang / /bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mnyam par ma bzhag dus su yang / /bya ba gang la 'jug pa na/ /lhan cig skyes las ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyi sems kyis mi gnas so/ /de yang brtag pa bcu drug pa las/ /bde ba gnag cing bde ba

ser/ /bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo/ /bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/ /bde ba thabs dang shes rab ste/ /de bzhin mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ /bde ba dngos po dngos med bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/ /ces gsungs so/ /de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa la

gnas pas/ bar chad thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma ni/ srung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par byas nas/ de'i dbus su chos kyi 'byung gnas bsams la/ de'i steng du paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa bsams la/ de'i steng du

oM las 'khor lo sa bon dang ldan pa las 'od zer 'phros pas/ gzugs med pa dang / gzugs can dang / 'dod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad 'od zer des sku rdo rje byas nas/ der bsdus te gcig tu gyur pa las/ sku rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bus shas

rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /shes rab ma yang thabs dang 'dra/ bar du hUM las rdo rje/ de las phyogs skyong thams cad der bsdus nas gcig tu gyur pa las/ thugs rdo rje sngon por bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu a

las pad+ma des lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad gsung rdo rje sku mdog dmar por bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan sku rdo rje dang 'dra'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa la sogs pa byas te gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa

spyan drangs nas/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang bskur nas/ sku rdo rje la rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ thugs rdo rje la mi bskyod pas/ gsung rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/

de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor/ der a las thod pa de'i nang du/ b+h+rUM AM dzrAM khaM hUM/ de nas bdud rtsir bsams la/ de nyid kyis mtshan par bsam par bya ste/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su hUM las rdo rje sa bon gyis mtshan par bsams la/ de'i stobs kyis

bskol la/ de'i steng du aM des ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs la/ gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de kho na'i snying po gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa byas nas/ 'dis dbul bar bya'o/ /oM kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ i daM/ pa liM/ b+huM dza/ dzi g+ha/ phul+la/ d+hU pa/ mAM sa/ biM g+ha/ am+ba sarba kadz+dza/

sarba sA d+ha/ khAn+ti/ khu Ni/ phe Ta/ gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nu t+pan+na twA ta/ oM AH hUM phaT swA hA/ 'dis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /

slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /muH/ kha zas la yang de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni dwa ba gyur na/ /de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ /rigs su skye dang dam tshig can/ /smyo med dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang / /bla mar gus shing snying rjer ldan/ /skye

zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /zab mo chos ni glog pa dang / /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /'dis ni bdag la rjes su dran/ /snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la/ /yan lag nag po byams pa'i thugs/ /phyag gnyis thabs

dang shes rab yin/ /zhal gcig gnyis med ye shes yin/ /zhabs gnyis bden pa gnyis su dran/ /phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo yin/ /sngags pas de ltar mos byas nas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor pas rgyu bar bya'o/ /rtag tu brtag par sngags bzlas dang / /

bsam gtan nyid dang bral mi bya/ /rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing / /rtag tu bshad par bya ba yin/ /sems can rnams ni rtag bskyang zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod bya/ /dzaM b+ha la la chu sbyin dang / /las rnams thams cad rab tu spyad/ /mchod rten las ni bye ma las/ /mkhas

pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /sgrub thabs rtsom dang mi ldan yang / /bla ma du ma'i man ngag bzhin/ /sgrub thabs byas las 'gal ba gang / /de nyid mkhyen pas bzod pa mdzod/ /tha ma 'bring dang rab don du/ /rim pa gsum ldan byas pa las/ /dge ba dri med thob pa des/ /

de nyid rin chen rab gsal shog /dgyes pa'i rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon chen po shrI A nan+da badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// @/ /sbyin sreg gi las kyi rim pa bzhugs so// @#/ /bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg gi

las kyi rim pa la/ dbang bskur ba'i sngon rol du rgyas pa'i las byas te/ dpangs khru gang la khru phyed thur du brko'o/ /sor bzhi phyir dgyed/ kha khyer sor bzhis bskos/ zheng dang dpangs sor bzhi bya/ de'i phyi rol gyi sor bzhi bor la/ pad+ma'i phreng ba gtang / dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje ra ba gtang /

spyir gru bzhi la zheng phyi rol gyi rgya khru gsum gtang / thab khung nang du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gzhag pa ni 'jim pa la sogs pa la zheng sor brgyad dpangs sor gcig gtang / dbus su rin po che/ shar rdo rje/ lhor 'khor lo/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du ral gri/ kha dog ser por byug go/ /rgyas pa'i

las la kha shar du blta'o/ /zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po khru gang du byas/ khru phyed zabs su brko/ kha khyer rgyas pa la sogs pa dang mthun par bya'o/ /dbus kyi kha khyer la rdo rje phreng ba gtang / de'i phyi rol du pad+ma gtang / thab khung du gtso bo'i phyag mtshan gzhag pa ni dbus su rdo rje/ shar du

'khor lo/ /lhor rin po che/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du ral gri/ zheng sor brgyad pa bya'o/ /kha dog dkar por byug /bla ma kha byang du blta/ dbang gi las la thab khung zla gam ste/ zla gam bshul la bzhi bcu btang / kha khyer la sor bzhi bcu tham pa/ zabs su sor bcu brko bar bya/ kha khyer

spyir mthun/ kha khyer rdo rje'i ra ba gtang / phyi rim du me ri gtang / kha dog dmar por byug /tsan+dan smug pos byug /dbus su gtso bo'i phyag mtshan btang ba/ pad+ma phyi ma spyir mthun/ dbang dang bskrad pa la kha nub tu blta/ drag po'i las kyi rim pa la/ thab khung zur gsum la/

sor nyi shu nyi shu bya'o/ /kha khyer sor gsum phyir dgyed/ kha khyer sor gsum bskor/ /zheng sor gsum gtang / de'i phyi rol du sor gsum gtang / kha khyer la rdo rje rtse gsum pa gtang / de'i phyi rim du thod pa dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung rtse gsum pa la sogs pa drag po'i phyag

mtshan gtang / gtso bo'i phyag mtshan dbus su ral gri/ phyi ma las kyi mtshan nyid dang / bla ma'i kha las shes par bya'o/ /kha dog nag pos byug /kha lhor blta'o/ /rgyas pa nang par bya'o/ /zhi ba nyi ma phyed na bya'o/ /dbang nyi ma nub na bya'o/ /drag po nam phyed na bya'o/ /me thab

kyi rim pa'o/ /mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas kyi rim pa la/ sngags mkhan gyi g.yon du dri dang me tog gis bkang ba'i dung phor gzhag /yon chab kyi snod gser la sogs pa las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa chab kyis bkang la gzhag /ma 'byor na sa las byas pa yang rung ngo / /dgang

gzar dang blugs gzar dang mar mdun du gzhag /g.yas su zangs gzhong gi nang du dris bkang la ku sha bcug la pro k+Sha Na'i snod gzhag go/ /las kyi bum pa gcig kyang gzhag go/ /til la sogs pa sreg rdzas kyang gzhag go/ /de la rdzas kyi rim pa rgyas pa la zho/ zhi

ba la til/ dbang la ut+pal dmar po/ drag po la tsher ma can gyi shing / phyi ma rim pa bzhin no/ /kun gyi sngon du mar/ tha mar yang mar ro/ /rdzas dgram pa'i rim pa'o/ /rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ gzhong bu kun gyi steng du rdo rje bzhag la/ de nyid gsum gyi sngags brjod pas/

'jig rten kun gyi rtog pa kun bsal nas/ rdzas de nyid bzang por bsam mo/ /yam shing gi rim pa la/ zhi ba'i yam shing ni 'o ma can gyi shing dang rlon pa rtse mo dang bcas pa byung ba/ srid du mdzub gang ba sboms su chag pa gang yod pa sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma dang / tsan+dan dkar po'i chus sbangs

pa/ rtse gcig tu zhi ba'i las la dbul lo/ /rgyas pa'i yam shing ni/ srid du khru gang ba sboms su zhi ba dang mthun no/ /yal ga dang dbus kyi cha las byung ba/ zho dang mar dang ser po'i dri las sbangs pa/ rtse gcig tu rgyas pa'i las la dbul lo/ /dbang gi yam shing la/ srid du

sor lnga pa 'dab ma dang sboms su chag gang ba yungs mar dang bdud rtsi la sogs kyis sbangs la/ dbang gi las la dbul lo/ /drag po'i yam shing ni/ srid du sor bzhi pa/ rtse mo can gyi shing las byung ba/ gsod pa'i las la rab tu shis pa/ mi rus dang dur khrod kyi

sol ba dang / thal chen lan tshwa kha ba dang / tsha ba'i rdzas rnams chu la sbangs la/ rab tu bsgrims la mngon spyod kyi las la dbul bar bya'o/ /yam shing gi rim pa'o/ /bud shing gi rim pa la/ pa la sha dang n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa las bya'o/ /de med na 'o ma can gyi shing skam po las byas

la las kyi rjes su mthun par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa dang / ku shas prok+Sha NaM bya'o/ /any+tsa mA naM a r+g+ha bi d+hi dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba dang / nang gi phyag rgya'i mchod pa bya/ phyag btsal/ de nas ku shas thams cad la pro k+Sha NaM bya'o/ /de nas

lcags la sogs pa'i snod sar par shing brtsigs la/ gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i me blangs la/ rlung yab kyis g.yabs la me sbar ro/ /de la sbar ba'i sngags ni/ oMdza la dz+wa la hUM phaT ces so/ /de nas du ba med cing legs par 'bar ba dang / thab khung gi shing ba rtsigs pa la blugs

so/ /me sbar ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas ku sha 'bring gnyis shar phyogs su kha bstan la gzhag /lho dang nub dang byang du yang de bzhin bstan/ ku sha dgram pa'i sngags/ oM badzra sa twa A u She swA hA/ ku sha dgram pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon yi dam bsgom pa dang ldan pas thab kyi

nang du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa cig bsams la/ de'i dbus su mngon par byang chub pa lnga dang ldan pas kye'i rdo rje yab yum bsgom mo/ /'dod chags chen po skyes pa'i stobs kyis zhu nas dngul chu bzhin du gnas pa las/ de nyid yi ge hUM dang dzaM gnyis su gyur/ yi ge gnyis

yongs su gyur pa las me lha yab yum du bskyed de/ me lha zhal gsum phyag drug pa gsus pa ldir ba ral pa'i thor cog can/ mchod phyir thogs 'chang ba/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yas kyi bar ma ni gun+d+he'o/ /tham mchod sbyin/ g.yon bar ma na ze 'bru/

tha ma na bgrang phreng sku mdog las kyi bye brag dang mthun pa'o/ /de ltar bsams pa'i thugs kar sna tshogs pad+ma de'i steng du gru gsum me/ de'i steng du b+h+rUM bsam/ dzaM bsam/ lce la raM bsam/ me lha dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /de la yang prok+Sha NaM la sogs pa gar yan

chad bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ slob dpon gar dang ldan pas/ dzaH lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo / /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' las kyang bkug la thab kyi khar bzhag /de nas prok+Sha NaM dang a ny+tsa mA naM la sogs pa phyag bya ba yan chad bya/ de nas yang prok+Sha NaM la

sogs pa gsum bya'o/ /gar dang ldan pas zhags pas gnyis su med par bstim/ lcags sgrog gis bcing / dril bus mnyes par bya/ de nas yang pro k+Sha NaM la sogs pa gsum bya'o/ /de nas gzar bu gnyis kyi nang du yi dam gyi lha'i snying po'i yi ge hUM re re bsam mo/ /de nas

gru mo gnyis sprad la/ mar gzar bu bdun dbul/ oM na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ag+na ye swA hA/ pur+Na ti ti man+t+ra/ oM ag+na ye puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ de nas blugs gzar gyis dbul bar bya ste/ dgang gzar gzhag /oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang zan gyi'o/ /de nas/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na

badzrA ya a mu ka sarba pA paM da ha swA hA/ til gyi'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ dUr ba'i'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ chag pa med pa'i 'bras kyi'o/ /oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i sngags so/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras kyi lag pan gyi'o/ /ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /

oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ chan gyi'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma ri ye swA hA/ gro'i'o/ /yam shing gi la/ oM badzra yadz+nyA ya swA hA/ u duM wA ra'i'o/ /oM bo d+hi prik+ShA ya swA hA/ byang chub shing gi'o/ /oM badzra rta tA ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzra sa ha ka rA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /de nas

yang mar dgang gzar khengs pa stong man chod dbul lo/ /de nas yang pro k+Sha NaM la sogs pa bya/ de kun rdzogs pa dang / rdo rje dkur brten dril bu gsil la/ srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i tshigs bcad brjod do/ /de nas me lha la bstod pa bya/ phyag bya/ de nas las kyi bum pa'i
