la rtog pa grol/ /'od gsal dbyer med gcig gi ngang / /byang chub sems kyi rang rig 'di/ /bag chags 'khrul pa'i dbang gis na/ /brtags pas sna tshogs med bzhin grub/ /sems kyi bag chags phyir snang yang / /rig pa 'od gsal 'gyur ba med/ /sna tshogs snang

ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /snying po gsung gis brjod bya ste/ /'khrul pa ma yin log snang bas/ /rang rig byang chub sems su brjod/ /rtog pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /rang rig sems la rtog par 'khrul/ /thog ma med dus bag chags dang / /rin chen gdams ngag rkyen med pas/ /rtog

med snying po sems ma goms/ /thag pa sbrul min snang ba bzhin/ /lus ngag sems dbyen sgyu ma'i lus/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /chos nyid yin par dbyer med pas/ /zung du 'jug pa gang dgongs pa/ /gsal ba'i sems de nyid la ni/ /chos nyid ma yin bag mi

snang / /thams cad snang ba'i ngo bo 'di/ /ye shes snying po nyid du mthong / /ngo bo nyid la brjod pa bral/ /rang bzhin rnam dag rig pa la/ /brjod med don du ma brjod na/ /rig pa'i don la mjal ba med/ /brjod pa'i sbra la sems drangs pas/ /ma bcos rang 'byung chos

nyid mthong / /rang rig sems la don rtogs nas/ /'jug thabs mi gnyis tshul gyis gnas/ /cig car rdzogs pa bde ba che/ /phyogs su ma lhung gzung ba'i sems/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes snying po la/ /rim pa'i lam med mthar phyin nas/ /rang 'byung rtogs pa'i 'jug pa la/ /

de nyid snying po don ldan pas/ /'dod pa'i tshogs la yid mi 'jug /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa drug /rang 'byung rdzogs pa'i sems la gnas/ /bsam bral mi rtog dgongs pa la/ /de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan/ /mi rtog 'dzin med tshul la gnas/ /ma yengs rig pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /

dmigs med shes pa pha rol phyin/ /sems nyid stong pa'i dngos med la/ /chos dang chos can mi gnas pas/ /dbyer med bden pa bzhi po don/ /dngos po ye shes 'gags ma yin/ /bden brdzun nyid kyi mthar mi 'dzin/ /snying po'i don la 'dod pa bral/ /kun bzang ye shes

'od gsal la/ /bsam bral ye shes nam mkha' 'dra/ /rdzogs pa ye shes ma bcos pa/ /mi 'gyur chos nyid dbyings kyi thugs/ /mi 'gag ye shes rig pa'i gsung / /dbyer med chos sku gzung 'dzin bral/ /sku gsung thugs bral sku gsung thugs/ /phyi nang mi mnga'

rang gsal nyid/ /'byung 'jug mi mnga' rang bzhin gnas/ /dbang po ngo la snang ba'i rnams/ /chos nyid byang chub sems su mthong / /nyon mongs lnga po ye shes lam/ /thams cad byang chub sems kyi gzhi/ /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /dag pa'i sems la brtsal

med de/ /brtsal ba'i kun rdzob grub ma yin/ /dam pa'i don la gang 'jug pas/ /gsang ba rdzogs pa'i don nyid la/ /chos nyid gsang ba 'di dmigs na/ /nges pa'i gdams ngag zab mo yis/ /brtsal med rang gzhag brtsal ba dang / /mi bsgom rang lugs bsgom pa

dang / /mi gnas tshul la 'dug pa dang / /gzhag med mnyam gzhag rang 'byung ba de/ /mi rtog don la gyi na ba/ /dge mi dge yi rnam rtog bral/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid do/ /rang 'byung byang chub brtsal ba min/ /byang chub 'dod la byang chub sems/ /yang dag don gyi snying po

'di/ /btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /zhen sems nyid la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /nyal ba'i bsam gtan 'khor lo bde/ /ma lus byang chub sems kyi dang / /chos nyid byang chub mnyam gzhag na/ /dngos med byang chub rang 'byung dang / /'dus ma byas pas bde ba'i klong / /

sems nyid bsam med brjod las 'das/ /ye nas rnam dag bsam du med/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rig pa yis/ /de la ma brtsal gnas na bsgoms/ /rig pa dbyings la yan bzhag na/ /brtsal ba'i nad bral bsgom pa yin/ /bde bas snying po dri ma med/ /rig pa

'od gsal nyid du bsgom/ /'od gsal sems la gnas gyur na/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma rang bzhin zhi/ /skye ba med pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rang snang kun bzang rol pa 'grub/ /dngos med dngos la mi dmigs shing / /dbu ma'i sems bral rgyu ba bral/ /sems kyi rgyu ba med pas

na/ /thams cad rang 'byung stong pa nyid/ /sems nyid rig pa rang 'byung ba/ /'gyur med skyod med gsal bas na/ /yi ge med pa'i snying po gsung / /dam pa byang chub sems la gnas/ /rgyal po'i dam tshig ma bcos pa/ /bsrung ba med pa'i tshul gyis bsrung / /'gyur ba

med pa'i phyag rgya la/ /'gyur ba med pa'i don gyis 'debs/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /ye shes 'phro 'du med par gsal/ /bsam bral rang bzhin rgyal ba'i thugs/ /byang chub sems la 'da' ba med/ /sa 'dzin rnam pa'i sems bzhin du/ gzhan

nas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /brtags na rang sems nyid la thug/ /gzhi la rang gzhag gzhan 'dod bral/ /rang sems rig pa 'gyur ba med/ /ji bzhin mi rtog chos kyi sku/ /bya bral lhun grub ji bzhin gnas/ /rang 'byung 'od gsal ye nas dag /cir yang mi dgongs

bsam mi khyab/ /shes rab snying rje ldan pas 'grub/ /snying po byang chub rang bzhin la/ /bsam med rang gzhag thugs su bde/ /'khor lo'am rig pa bde ba yis/ /rang gnas rig pa tshol ba nyid/ /rnam rtog yin te don la med/ /blon rigs gsum las

dmangs kyi yang / /chags pa'i 'du shes drang ba'i don/ /nges par spros bral rang 'byung sems/ /chags pa'i lam gyis shes mi 'gyur/ /blang dor med pa'i brtul zhugs kyang / /nges par brtags na blang dor nyid/ /rang rig bsam bral gzhag pa ste/ /don dngos 'dzin pa

zhen par gnas/ /rang 'byung 'od gsal snying po 'di/ /mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /shes rab thabs kyi chags pa bral/ /thig le 'dod rtsol spro bsdu med/ /rang rig rtsol bral bde ba'i gnas/ /shes rab thabs la snyoms 'jug pas/ /bde ba'i bsam gtan chen po yin/ /

sgyu ma'i ro la ma chags pas/ /chags med ye shes rdzogs pa'i lam/ /byang chub sems kyi rang gsal 'di/ /dngos med shes rab thabs kyis 'grub/ /snang gsal 'khor lo rig pa 'di/ /ngo bo ma grub me shel 'dra/ /dngos med ye shes mthong ba grol/ /gzugs sogs

snang ba brtags pa yin/ /dngos po rang bzhin thams cad ni/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi thig le yin/ /de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs su ni/ /snying po rig pa nyid shar bas/ /mtha' yi mun pa ngang gis dag /sgrub med rang 'byung sgrub pa 'dis/ /khams gsum 'od gsal thugs su sgrub/ /rang

sems rig pa'i spyod pa bde/ /ye shes spyod pa rang gzhag nyid/ /bsal nas 'dod pa'i mtha' mi 'gegs/ /thugs rje tshogs kyi bsod nams 'dir/ /rang 'byung rig pa rtogs gyur nas/ /'gro ba drang phyir rgyun mi bcad/ /snying po sems kyi don rig na/ /ye shes mthar phyin

'bras bur gnas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin grub/ /sprul pa rang 'dod cir yang 'byung / /chu gsal ri bong can bzhin no/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /me shel gzugs ltar 'gro ba sgrol/ /ye shes rang byung de bzhin gshegs/ /yan lag mi mnga' rtsis las

'das/ /mthar phyin dga' ba rig par gsal/ /dgongs pa rang gzhag ye sangs rgyas/ /rig pa rang gsal chos rnams la/ /gang yang bsam du med par gnas/ /de ltar byang chub sems nyid la/ /ma rig med pas 'khor ba med/ /sems can skye ba'i rgyu ma gnas/ /rang 'byung

sems la rtag par gzhug /srid pa'i chos la rgyu med pas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang bral/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig /sems kyi ye shes gsang ba 'di/ /snying po don las rmad du byung / /rang

'byung che ba bdag nyid sku/ /rang rig bde ba rdzogs pa che/ /thugs rje snang ba sprul pa'i sku/ /ngo bo ma grub gsang ba'i sems/ /snang dang mi snang dbyer med do/ /yod dang med pa byang chub sems/ /snang ba rang rig tha dad pa/ /don dang rtags la sogs pa'i rnams/ /rnam pa

tha dad bag chags snang / /yang dag ma yin 'khrul pa'i sems/ /bsam pa'i dbang gis der 'gyur ro/ /bde gshegs ye shes gsang ba de/ /ma mthong rnam rtog spros 'chal pas/ /stong nyid rig pa'i man ngag yin/ /dran rtog rlung gi rgyu ba bral/ /mtha' ru ma skyes

bsam gtan bya/ /chos dang chos nyid gang yang min/ /nam mkha' lta bu bdag med pa/ /ye shes stong pa'i ngo bo'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa mtshan ma med/ /rnam thar gsum ldan bde ba che/ /chags med gzhi yi lam nas 'jug /mtshan med ngang la gnas pa na/ /rang 'byung 'bras bu dang gis 'char/ /

yon tan nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam/ /rang gi ye shes snang ba la/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gsal/ /rgyun gyi 'khor lo sku yi dang / /chags bral dag pa rig pa'i rgyan/ /rang rig gsal ba ting 'dzin nyid/ /mi zad

'khor lo bsam du med/ /sgro bral stong nyid zhi gnas la/ /'du shes 'jug med mnyam gzhag la/ /mtshan med zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel/ /mos 'jug lam la gang gnas nas/ /mi rtog gsal ba'i don gyis go/ /bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /snying po don la

rtog pas 'jug /thabs bral rig pa rtsol bas tshol/ /ra gan gser 'dod de bzhin no/ /'dod pa'i sems dang ma bral na/ /snying po don la bdag 'dzin byed/ /bde ba'i sems la re ba na/ /rtog pa'i rjes 'jug zhi gnas yin/ /rang lus sems sum

rtogs par/ /'dra 'bag lha yi rnam pa gzung / /lus kyi dben pas chos nyid tshol/ /rang lus sems su shes pas na/ /gang na gnas kyang sems nyid dben/ /snang srid sems su shes pas na/ /dbang po yan lag ye shes gsal/ /snying po don gyi rang bzhin la/ /ci yang

mi bsgom gang yang min/ /khyu mchog sems ltar ma bcos pa/ /rang gzhag rig pa'i 'khor lo nyid/ /dus gsum du yang btang gzhag med/ /gang yang mi 'dzin dgag pa med/ /snying po don gyi rang bzhin la/ /skyon dang yon tan gnyis med pas/ /rdzogs pa'i lta ba

blang dor med/ /'jug med ting 'dzin ma yengs pa/ /'od gsal rgyal ba'i sems nyid yin/ /rang 'byung thugs kyis ma bcos pa/ /rnam dag rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs/ /brtsal med snying po don las 'byung / /byang chub sems kyi don nyid la/ /nges pa'i theg gcig

snying po'i don/ /phyag rgya rim bzhi sbyor ba drug /bsam pa'i theg pa sna tshogs pa/ /drang ba nyid 'gyur nges pa min/ /ngo bo nyid la mthon dman med/ /mos 'jug bsam pa'i rtog par zad/ /sems nyid nyag gcig phyogs bral ba/ /du ma'i 'bras med lam du min/ /ma bcos

rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i lam/ /mi gnas rang bzhin sems su gcig /ma bgrod mthar phyin 'bras bu'am/ /rgyu rkyen bral ba skye 'jig med/ /gdod nas rang 'byung snying por gsal/ /rig drug ji ltar snang ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ /dbyer med

rang 'byung sems su gcig /ris drug sems kyi rtog pa dang / /ye shes rang gsal rig pa nyid/ /khyad par med de snying por gcig /khams gsum 'khor ba snang ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i ye shes nyid/ /rtogs ma rtogs kyis gnyis su byung / /rtogs pas

rang sems nyid la thugs/ /gzhan 'dod re ba rtsol ba bral/ /rang sems rnam dag ye sangs rgyas/ /kun bzang rgyal ba'i sems nyid bde/ /mtha' yas 'gro ba thams cad la/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes rang chas ldan/ /bsam bral rang lugs cir mi dgongs/ /ye shes nam mkha'i

mkha' dang mnyam/ /yid la mi byed bya ba btang / /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /rnam pa phra rags cir snang yang / /rang gzhag bsam bral nyid du bde/ /chu yi snang ba de bzhin du/ /phra rags rnam rtog ye shes nyid/ /rang rig gnyug ma pad+ma ltar/ /'khor bar gnas kyang gdod

nas dag /mtshan ma'i rnam pa ci 'byung yang / /chu shing lta bur snying po med/ /ma rig 'thibs pa'i 'khor ba na/ /rig pa mar me lta bur gsal/ /rnam par rtog pa cir 'gyur yang / /rang rig gnyug ma'i rgyun mi bcad/ /nam langs sems dang nub kha bzhin/ /ye shes don

gsal de bzhin no/ /ma bsgrubs rang gsal ngang gis 'byung / /skal ldan ma bcos rnal 'byor pas/ /sems nyid steng kha ltar gnas na/ /lus ngag rtsol ba ngang gis zhi/ /bde ba'i ye shes mi rtog pa/ /shes rab gsal ba'i snying por phyin/ /mthar phyin rang 'byung mi rtog pa/ /dri med rgyal ba'i

ye shes gsal/ /rang gnas 'gro ba yongs la khyab/ /nam mkha' lta bur dbyer med pa/ /'gro ba'i sems las gzhan la med/ /rtog med ngang la rang shar ba'i/ /rig pa bde ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /'dzin pa dag byed ye shes ni/ /ma bcos ngang gis rang rig gsal/ /ye shes

thig le'i don 'di ni/ /shes rab gsal bas bdag la bstan/ /bde ba'i rang rig rtog pa bral/ /rang gnas ye shes 'od gsal sems/ /mthong bas the tshom rgyu ba bral/ /ye shes ngang gnas sgrib pa med/ /thams cad ye shes gsal mthong bas/ /snying po don la gos pa med/ /rnam

dag rig pa'i 'khor lo 'di/ /rtsol bral rang 'byung ye shes yin/ /rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi bdag /lus dang bral ba yan lag med/ /sgro skur bral ba'i dngos gzhi can/ /snying po kun bral kun gyi bdag /ma bcos rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal/ /bya ba med bzhin don kun rdzogs/

rang 'byung gnyug ma kun gyi gzhi/ /bgrod med rnal 'byor lhun grub lam/ /ji bzhin kun rdzogs 'bras bu nyid/ /thig le dbyer med gcig gi ngang / /sems nyid bya bral rdzogs pa'i gter/ /bde ba'i ye shes mi rtog thugs/ /skal ldan dang po nyid nas rdzogs/ /'gro drug

'khor ba'i rtog pa dang / /rgyal ba'i ye shes mya ngan 'das/ /bde chen rig pa gcig gi ngang / /rang 'byung ji bzhin ma bcos pa/ /lhun rdzogs spros pa med pa'i ngang / /bsam du med pa'i ye shes 'di/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu ba bral/ /dus gsum mi mnga' rgyun mi 'chad/ /sems

nyid grub pa'i lam mchog 'di/ /dbyer med kun la ldan bzhin du/ /snang ba'i lam med 'khor bar 'khyam/ /sdug bsngal rtsol ba'i nad kyis gdungs/ /des na snying po sgron ma 'di/ /phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams don du/ /bla ma 'phags pa'i byin rlabs dang / /mos pa'i mthu ldan

bdag gis rtogs/ /snying rjes kun bslang yongs la bsngo/ /snying po de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs/ yang dag pa'i sa la gnas pa/ slob dpon na ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta badzra gu na b+ha dra dang lo tsA ba rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ro// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA su kha a mr-i ta pra b+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo pad+ma rgyas gang ba/ /rang gi gnas ni nyid du 'khyil/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /'gro ba kun la rang bzhin

gnas/ /yang dag pa de rab tu bshad/ /yang dag pa yang rnam pa bzhi/ /de ni lus la rab tu gnas/ /'di ltar shes pa'i lus nyid ni/ /bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya/ /lte ba gsang ba'i drug cu bzhi'o// sprul pa'i yig 'bru dkar po bkod/ /A li kA li g.yas dang g.yon/ /ye shes

bzhi yi yi ge oM/ /dbus kyi ri bong 'dzin par ro/ /sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ /sems kyi gnas su sku sogs brgyad/ /kha dog dkar po yi ge dgu / hUM prUM trAM hriM khaM yig rnams/ /dbus nas byang du rim bzhin dgod/ /mtshams su laM la sogs pa bzhi/ /mtshan ma med pa'i

sku zhes bshad/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bcu drug /mgrin pa'i gnas su yang dag skyes/ /de yi ri bong 'dzin par oM/ /ya wa ra la yi ge rnams/ /shar nas byang du rim bzhin no/ /rtogs yul bcu rlung gnyis kyi gnas/ /'byung bzhi'i rtags ni 'dzin par bshad/ /sa bon zla ba

rgyas 'dra ba/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khyil/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rang bzhin gnas/ /de yi gnas na A li gnyis/ /g.yas dang g.yon gnyis mgo dang mjug /gcig tu phrad pas brgyan pa yin/ /de dbus haM las sra ma na/ /longs spyod mkhyen la bde chen thur/ /thabs

dang shes rab tshul du gnas/ /chos dang sprul pa'ang de bzhin no/ /kun gyi dbus nas ri bong 'dzin/ /'khor lo yi ge kha dog dkar/ /yaM las 'byung ba rlung dkyil 'khor/ /ha gnyis gnas su bsam par bya/ /de steng raM byung gru gsum me/ /rang gi gnas su bsam par bya/ /de

ltar rang bzhin kun shes nas/ /ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs las/ /rlung gis me bus bcu drug 'bar/ /de nyid ye shes me zhes bya/ /lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas/ /kun gyi lus bsregs mgo

gcig bsams/ /longs spyod gsum skar 'byung bzhi'o/ /bsregs nas g.yas 'byung sangs rgyas dang / /sems can kun bsregs dbu ma g.yon/ /thim ste bde chen g.yon nas bskor/ /bsregs nas rna ba g.yas su 'du/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bsregs gcig byed/ /

a ba d+hU tI'i gnas nas byung / /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med bsregs/ /steng gi zhabs su sra ma na/ /bde ba chen po'i lus kyang skyes/ /haM dkar las byung ser po dkar/ /lus skyes mi la ye shes bskyed/ /de ru ma nus chu yi rtsa/ /g.yon gyi rtsa nas sprul pa ru/ /der ni yang

dag rab tu gzung / /de ru mi gnas sam po ka /rtsa ba'i rdo rje lam nas 'gro/ /sam po ka nas chos sku'o/ /lus rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /skyes nas bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ /chos kyi gnas su ma skyes na/ /nir ma ka yi gnas su bsam/ /yang dang yang du 'di bzhin bya/ /

rnam rtog med pa'i rnal 'byor skye/ /yar gyis bsregs shing mar gyis gso/ /rnal 'byor mig gi 'od zer gyis/ /rtag tu 'di la blta bar bya/ /nam zhig 'di la brten gyur na/ /mtshan ma lnga 'am yang na g.yo/ /'bar zhing g.yon yig go bcad/ /bcad pas bzhi

po yang yang zhu/ /rtsa ba'i rdo rje lam nas ni/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin rgyas par 'byung / /rnal 'byor mthar phyin 'bras bu ste/ /bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya/ /gzhan gyi don sogs yon tan rnams/ /'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub/ /bla na med pa'i dgongs rgyud 'di/ /dpal gyi zhabs kyis

bdag la bstan/ /rkyen dang rnal 'byor gnyis su 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po zhes su bstan/ /sbyor ba'i rgyud ni thams cad las/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sbas ba bshad/ /shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i/ /snod ldan bdag nyid chen pos gzung / /lus sems bde bar spyad nas ni/ /

nying mtshams sbyor ba bsten par bya/ /bdag gis brtsams kyi bdud rtsi 'od/ /'di ltar khams gsum kun kyang de/ /shing dang 'dra bar mtshungs pa'o/ /yang dag bde bas 'tsho bar shog /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal ye shes rin po che'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs

so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bod+hi tsi t+tabin+hu u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang sems thigs pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa bon zla ba rgyas 'dra ba/ /'khor lo chen po'i gnas su 'khyil/ /sangs rgyas kun byi snying po ste/ /

'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /yang dag par te dang por bshad/ /rtog yul chu rlung gis 'khyags te/ /de na sdug bsngal sna tshogs bskyed/ /de 'gags nas ni 'jug par 'dod/ /cha ni sna rtser bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i lte bar shes rab thabs/ /kha sbyor bar ni der gas pa/ /

shel ltar dri med yungs kar ro/ /rnga 'brum brgyar gshags skar khung ni/ /thabs kyi cha yi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /ba thag yi ger ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje las su dkri bar bya/ /rnal 'byor mig gi 'od zer gyis/ /yungs kar dag la blta bar bya/ /nam zhig de la brten 'gyur na/ /mtshan

ma lnga dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba skyed par byed pa yi/ /tshogs kyi rang bzhin dri ma med/ /'di ltar khams gsum kun kyang ste/ /rgyu yi ye shes dmigs med pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa ste/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes so/ /sna yi lam nas 'phro ba yi/ /rang gi gnas nas rlung

bskyod pa'o/ /g.yon pa dang ni 'bar ba yis/ /skar khung dag gi lam nas ni/ /'khor lo cher ni 'gro bar 'dod/ /yang dag pa ste 'ju bar 'gyur/ /rtsa yi rdo rje'i lam nas ni/ /til gyi 'bru bzhi rgyas par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mthar phyin 'bras bu ste/ /bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya/ /

gzhan gyi don sogs yon tan rnams/ /'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub/ /ye shes drug pa gsang chen po/ /rgyu zhes bya ba yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas zhabs kyis bdag la bstan/ /rkyen dang rnal 'byor gnyis su 'gyur/ /'bras bu bzhi ni gsang chen bo/ /bde ba chen po zhes bya

ste/ /sbyor ba'i rgyud ni thams cad las/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sbas pa yang / /shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i/ /snod ldan bdag nyid chen pos gzung / /lus sems bde bar spyad nas ni/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba bsten par bya/ /sangs rgyas zhabs kyis bstan pa'o/ /thabs dang shes

rab gnyis med pa'i/ /byang chub sems kyi ye shes 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsgom par shog/ //thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa byang sems thigs pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po las kyi zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ra ha s+ya A nan+da ti la ka nA ma/ bod skad du/gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma las byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel mdzad pad+ma las byung lha mo'i mchog gnyis dga' ba'i mgon/ /'gro ba'i

sdug bsngal zhi mdzad khro bo'i rgyal po dga' byed thugs rje'i dgos/ /'gro ba bde ba sbyin mdzad phongs pa thams cad skyob pa lha yi gtso bo mchog /srid gsum skyob 'os 'byor pa ma lus 'byung la rab tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje theg pa 'di la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor

pa dag /sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang chen dag gis/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i thig le la 'jug pa bshad par bya'o/ /de la re zhig dang por sku'i gsang chen brjod par bya ste/ 'dir bya ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa ltar tha dad par snang ba'i lha yi dmigs pa ni mi bya'i/ /gang la

bdag tu brtags shing mi gsang bar brtags pa'i lus 'di nyid kho na la lhar dmigs par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myur du yongs su dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /tha dad pa ni de las bzlog pa'o/ /de'i phyir gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /lha

la dmigs par byed pa dag /rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye/ /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor skye/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor bas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par byed/ /ces so/ /ci'i

phyir dang po'i dmigs pa dor zhe na/ /'di ni dam pa'i bsgrub pa ste/ /gang gsungs pa/ tha mal rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rang la lha yi ngar 'dzin bya/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bde ba chen po so sor gsungs pa thos nas/ ched du brjod pa'i ched du brjod do/ /tha mal rnam rtog gzhom don du/ /yang dag bsgom pa rab grags kyi/ /tha mal gnas skabs choms nas ni/ /sgom pa'ang bsgom par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i da ni de lta'o/ /de de lta

mod kyi 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i lus 'di sbyangs la sangs rgyas kyi skur rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes so/ /thabs gang zhig gis 'di bsgom par bya/ 'dir ni skyes nas drod gsher dang / mngal dang / sgo nga dang / rdzus te 'byung ba dag gis bsgom mo/ /ji ltar 'gro ba dang 'dren

pa nyid do/ /brjod pa mi 'dra ba nyid kyis bstan te/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtag dang / /gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag /rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung / /de bzhin du dang po dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'o/

rnal 'byor spyod pa dag gis brtags/ /dbu ma yongs su rdzogs pa dag /rnal 'byor gyi ni cho gar bshad/ /ces so/ /'di ni rim pa las ma 'das pas bsgom ste/ gang gsungs pa/ dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pa/ /de sprul sku la goms par bya/ /sprul pa'i sku

ni brtan gyur nas/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa brtan par bsgom/ /sprul pa'i sku ni gsal gyur cig /longs spyod rdzogs pa gsal tsam na/ /chos sku dmigs pa med pa ste/ /'di ni mdor bsdus smos pa'o/ /zhes so/ /rim pa gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ ji skad du

slob dpon Dom+bi pas bshad pa/ bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa blo bzangs kyis/ /rtag tu dang po nyid du bya ba ste/ /phyag rgya sngags ni rnam par dag tsam dang / /cho ga thams cad brjod par bya ba min/ /phyi nas khyad par ldan zhing bde blag tu/ /yud tsam re res de nyid sems

gcig na/ /srid pa 'jig pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom pa ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa rtag tu bsam par bya/ /zhes so/ /'di ni thams cad du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji skad gsungs pa/ tha mal rnam pa gzhom don du/ /rang la lha yi ngar 'dzin bya/ /ngar 'dzin de yang

gzhom pa'i phyir/ /dmigs pa med pa rnam par bsgom/ /gang tshe sems ni mnyam gnas pa/ /de tshe de nyid yin par nges/ /zhes pa dang / yang gsungs pa/ tha mal rnam pa gzhom don du/ /yang dag bsgom par rab grags kyi/ /tha mal gnas skabs choms nas

ni/ /sgom pa'ang bsgom par mi bya'o/ /zhes so/ /thogs pa med pas 'di gnas te/ /gang gsungs pa/ phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus dang ldan par bsgom pa 'di la dgos pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang

ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das mtshan ci skad ces bgyi ba mchis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ces bgyi pa de ji lta bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ /de ci nus can

zhig gam/ de ni de bzhin du bden no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku 'di ni nga yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul rnams kyis rgyus nga bsgrub par bya ba yin pas

na'o/ /phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po'am/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes de ji lta bu/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa/ de bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin la/ blang

bar bya ba yang min la dor bar bya ba yang min no/ /de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang nga'o/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang nga'o/ /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyang nga'o/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyang nga'o/ /de bas na byang chub sems

dpa' chen po byang chub 'di/ dngos po med pa de skad du ma smra shig /dngos po med nyid dngos po 'ang nga / /de bzhin gshegs par gdod nas grol/ /mchog gi sku dang ldan pa ste/ /zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba/ /he ru ka nga'o sems dpa' che/ /bdag med ma dang thabs cig

sbyor/ /bde chen nga ni bems po min/ /'jig rten gzhug phyir bems po nga zhes/ /yang gsungs pa/ gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta ba/ /de bzhin bsgom bya'i dngos gang yang / /stong zhing snang med gnas mchog ste/ /de tshe sdig dang bsod nams med/ /dper na chu nang

zla ba ni/ /grogs dag bden min brdzun pa'ang min/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di/ /dang zhing gsal ba'i ngo bo'o/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin du/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haH sarba rmAH swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes gsungs so/ /'di ni med pa las brtags pa tsam ma yin pa ste/

gang gsungs pa/ lha yi sku yi sbyor ba yang / /skyes tsam nyid nas mngon par gnas/ /kha dog phyag zhal dbyibs 'dra las/ /cung zad rang bzhin bag chags so/ /zhes pa dang / yang gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can sangs

rgyas yin pa la/ /cung zad glo bur dri mas bsgribs/ /de bsal ba ni sangs rgyas so/ /zhes so/ /'di yi bsgrub pa nyid ci gang gi tshe mngon sum du gyur pa kho na'o/ /'di ni sku'i gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o// //da ni gsung gi gsang chen mngon par brjod par bya ste/ sku'i gsang

chen la gnas pa de'i ngag gi gnas su yi ge hrIH dmar po las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la/ lce'i 'dab ma la yi ge hUM dkar po las rdo rje dkar po bsams te/ oM badzra dzi hwa zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la/ de nyid du de thim pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du mos pa bskyed de/ khro bo'i

brjod pa'am/ rdo rje'i brjod pas rang gi bla ma'i gdams ngag dang mthun pa'i bzlas pa bya'o/ /de la khro bo'i brjod pa ni/ sprin byung 'brug sgra yi ge hUM/ /zab mo rdo rje'i tshig brtan pa/ /khro bo gsal ba khro chen po'o/ /rdo rje'i tshig ces grub pa'o/ /zhes pa'o/ /rdo rje'i

brjod pa ni/ lce rtse shin tu mi bsgul zhing / /so dang mchu gnyis 'byar byas pa/ /rtog pa kun la sbyar ba ste/ /rdo rje'i brjod pa sgra yangs pa'o/ /zhes so/ /de yang thun mong gi yan lag ni/ rtog pa kun las btus pa las gsungs pa/ bzlas brjod byed tshe khro mi bya/ /

yul gyi bdag nyid dga' mi bya/ /zhum dang mi dga' 'jigs pa dang / /'jungs dang nga rgyal yongs su spang / /zlos tshe ci yang mi bsam zhing / /yan lag 'gyur bar mi bya'o/ /kun rtog rlung gis bskyod nas ni/ /ci yang rung ba mi bsam mo/ /rig sngags lha ni ma

gtogs pa/ /sgom pa mchog tu gyur pa yang / /zlos pas bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe/ /kun rtog bzung nas mi bsam mo/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de ltar zhugs pa des ci tsam gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur/ phreng ba las ltos pa ni/ mkhas pas gsang

sngags yi ge ni/ /bco lnga man chad grangs rnams la/ /yi ge'i sdom ni du yod pa/ /de snyed 'bum phrag bzlas brjod bya/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ /bzlas brjod sum 'bum bya bar bshad/ /yi ge de las lhag pa las/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri

bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa med par yang / /las rnams phal ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gang du dus la ltos pa ni/ /rdzogs ldan dus su yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ /gnyis ldan dus kyi sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis/ /gsum ldan dus su de nyid gsum

du 'gyur/ /bye ba phrag sum 'bum bzhi rtsod dus sbyar/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gzhi la ltos pa ni/ rgyud la lar ni ci nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ /bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o/ /bsod

nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub po/ /de ltar rdo rje can chen po rgyud kyi bdag pos gsungs so/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ /sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis ni 'bum bzlas par

bdag smra'o/ /sems can bsgom pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas par bya'o/ /sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ blun pa dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/ /

shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /gal te man pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bzlas na/ bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do zhes gsungs

so/ /'di'i grub pa nyid ci/ bya ba nges pa thob pa nyid do/ /'di ni gsung gi gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o// //da ni thugs kyi gsang chen brjod par bya ste/ sngar bshad pa'i sku dang gsung gsang ba chen po la gnas pa des/ dngos po thams cad dang

bral zhing / /phung pho khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid/ /rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /zhes pa rtogs pa'o/ /'di yang gang rig pa'i rjes su

'gro ba ni/ 'phags pa nA ga rdzu na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i dbu ma las grub pa'o/ /thabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gis ni/ rlung dang / rtsa dang / thig le dang / phra mo dang / rdo rje nor bu'i nang dang / rig ma la brten pa dang / ril por 'dzin pa dang / rjes su 'dzin

pa dag gi 'grub po/ /bgrang dang rjes su 'gro dang gnas/ /mtshan nyid de nas rnam ldog dang / /yongs su dag pa nyid dang drug /'di ni 'ong ba gzung bar dran/ /'dir thun mong min pa sbyar ba rlung las grub pa'o/ /lte bar tsaN+DalI sbar bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga

bsreg cing / /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /bsregs pas haM las zla ba 'bab/ /rtsa las grub pa'o/ /ji skad du/ kam+Ya la AR+Yas bshad pa/ thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa'o/ /zhes so/ /thig le dang phra mo dag gi 'grub pa'o/ /chu bo'am lteng ka'i

chu ni dri med dag la zla ba gnas pa ltar/ /de bzhin de la rim gyis 'jig pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsam/ /me long la ni rlung dag rim gyis zar pa bzhin du'ang blta bya ste/ /ril por 'dzin pa la bya ba'i rim pa 'di ni de bzhin rab tu brtag ces bya ba ni/ rdo rje

nor bu'i nang du rtogs pa'i 'grub pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na/ /bsgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya/ /skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces pa ni/ rig ma la brten pas 'grub pa'o/ /ril por 'dzin pa rjes su gzhig

pa ni/ chu bo'am lteng ka'i chu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar 'das ma thag pas 'grub pa'o/ /'di dag ni shes rab ye shes la brten pas 'grub la/ gsang ba gnyis ni bum pa'i dang gsang ba'i dbang las 'byung ba'o/ /yong ni thugs kyi gsang chen ma

grub par nyon mongs pa mi 'gog la/ de la ma 'gags na sku dang gsung gi gsang chen mi 'grub ste/ ji skad du/ yab gcig lha rnams thugs rje med dam ci/ /da lta'i sems can shin tu 'grub par dka'/ /bu gcig lha rnams thugs rje'i

rang bzhin na/ /ding sang sems can nyon mongs dra bas khyab/ /ces bshad do/ /thugs kyi gsang chen nyid du sku'i gsang chen dang gsung gi gsang chen yang 'jug ste/ ji skad du/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma las

bshad pa/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'char/ /shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga'/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can/ /mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog /ces pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan las kyang / 'jig rten

sgron ma khyod kyi gsung / /ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na/ /de dag dri med bde ba 'thob/ /bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kyang 'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /yang gsungs pa/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod mi bya ste/ /dka' thub sbyin sreg ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor ldan

med dkyil 'khor med/ /de yi gsang sngags bzlas pa dang / /de yi dka' thub sbyin sreg ni/ /sems ni mdo ru bsdus tshul lo/ /zhes so/ /mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyi/ /dngos grub rgyal ba dam par bzhed/ /mtshan ma med la gnas pas ni/ /mtshan

par bcas pa 'grub tu rung / /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan ma med la gnas par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas na grub pa gsum char gyi thugs gsang bas 'thob pa yang ngo / /gang gis thugs gsang chen ma shes par gnas pa de ni/ dbugs ma phyin par gnas

pa ste/ ji skad du gsungs pa/ gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba/ /de dag 'khor zhing nyam nga zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ stong pa'i chos kyis mi mkhas gang 'jigs pa/ de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring po yin/ /stong nyid chos la the tshom su med pa/ /de dag

sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa nA gA rdzu nas bshad pa/ gang gis stong nyid mi shes pa/ /de la thar pa'i skal med de/ /'gro drug srid pa'i btson ra ru/ /rmongs pa de ni 'khyam par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin

du gang gis thugs gsang chen ma shes pa des ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba ma yin te/ de skad du gsungs pa/ ji ltar mthong bzhin su blta ba/ /de dag 'dren pa mi mthong ngo / /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug cing / /gang tshe sangs rgyas mi mthong la/ /'jug med sangs

rgyas yin par ni/ /gal te mthong na de sangs rgyas/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ de ltar skye 'jig spangs pa yis/ /thub pa zhi ba sus mthong ba/ /de dag 'di dang slad mar yang / /chags med nyer len med par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/

gang zag med cing phung po med/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa/ /rtag tu zhi ba rnam bsgoms te/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ gang gis nga la sgrar shes shing / /gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong / /log par spong bar zhugs pa ste/ /

skye bo de dag nga mi mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta/ /'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/ /chos nyid shes par bya min pas/ /de ni rnam par shes mi nus/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs/ /chos rnams thams cad bde bar gshegs dang 'dra/ /

byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams/ /'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod/ /ces so/ /yang gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku yin gyis/ dge slong dag 'jig tshogs la skur ma 'dzin pa/ dge slong dag nga ni chos kyi sku yongs

su rdzogs par ltos shig /ces gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rtog pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par blta'o zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs

pa ni chos kyi sku'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am bzhud pa med do zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing / /gang gis gshegs su gsol

ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams/ /gang na 'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus/ /gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol/ /de nyid kyis ni rtag med par/ /de bzhin gshegs la

phyag bya'o/ /zhes so/ /'di'i grub pa de nyid ci/ /chos kyi sku la gnas pa nyid dang / grub pa'i skyes bur gyur pa na'o/ /'di ni thugs kyi gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o/ /da ni gsang ba gsum las byung ba'i 'bras bu brjod de/ yang gsungs pa/ chu rgyus

dra ba dang bcas shing / /yan lag kun ldan bu ga can/ /lus de med par snang gyur pa/ /de yi skad cig de la ni/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i skur 'dzin 'gyur/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin dmigs med cing / /mtshan ma med cing skye ba med/ /sna tshogs rnam bral sgrib lnga spangs/ /sangs

rgyas dngos rnams dang bral ba/ /me long gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du/ /de'i bdag nyid du rab snang ba/ /he ru ka yi dngos por gsal/ /'di nyid dbang po yul rnams dang / /phung por gnas pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /bden nyid 'dir rab skye lus te/ /'dus byas don gyis

gzhan min pas/ /mig gis gzugs ni 'dzin med cing / /rna ba yis ni sgra min no/ /lce yis kyang ni ro mi tshor/ /sna yis kyang ni dril min/ /lus kyi gong bus reg med de/ /bde ba chen po'i gzugs phyir na'o/ /bud med mchog mthong las bde zhing / /glu thos las

kyang yang dag bde/ /dri zhim ma las bde ba che/ /skye gnas reg las kyang bde che/ /ro mchog btung ba'i rab sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba dag ni su yis bzlog /ces so/ /don 'di nyid ni rim pa lnga pa las kyang bshad de/ ji ltar dang ba'i chu dag las/ /nya ni myur du ldang ba ltar/ /de

bzhin thams cad stong gsal las/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'byung bar bshad/ /ces so/ /da ni 'di ltar gyur pa de'i mtshan ma bstan pa lung la 'jug par bya ste/ /ji skad du dpal yang dag sbyor ba'i thig le'i phreng ba las gsungs pa/ de nas gang du rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa der

'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste/ sa 'di dga' zhing mgu la rangs pas rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa/ bdud kyi gnas su cha lang lta bu'i sgra grags pa dang / phyogs bcur bskal pa'i me 'bar ba lta bu'i skar mda' lhung ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra dang / thams

cad du gnam rdo lhung ba dang / de nyid bskal pa'i me'i gzugs lta bu'i ye shes kyi snang ba 'bar ba dang / phyag rgya'i skye gnas kun du khams gsum thams cad snang ba dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / chu bdag dang brgya byin dang / drag po dang me dang / stobs bzangs dang /

nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / grub pa dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye dang / lha'i mchog dang / rigs 'dzin dang / chu 'byung ba la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas pa'i lha rnams der 'ongs nas yang dag

par dga' bas me tog gis mchod par byed do/ /pi wang dang / gling bu dang / mu kun+da dang / tam+pu ra dang / dung dang / zangs dung dang / ban+ti dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rdza rngas nam mkhar gnas te rtag tu mchod par byed do/ /lha'i bu mo dang / rigs 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i bu

mo thams cad kyis gar byed pa dang sil snyan du ma byed pa dang / mi 'am ci dang / gnod sbyin gyis glu len par byed cing / de la dga' ba dang bcas pas/ rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgras rtag tu rol pa byed pa dang / gang gis grub pa la nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams

kyis ni legs pa'i rnam pa rab tu gsol bar byed do/ /dga' ldan du gnas pa'i lha rab mchog gang yin pa dang / lha'i bu gang yin pa dang / rigs 'dzin dang / 'og min gyi bar dag 'ongs nas phyag 'tshal zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi dri'i char dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyis/ /gus pa'i

tshul gyis mchod par byed de/ /gzhan yang khyod la rgyas par bshad pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya ste/ bsgrub par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis khams gsum gyi gang zhig mchod pa de rnams kyis mchod par byed do/ /de yang gsungs pa/ rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni/ /gang du mchis

shing gang du gnas/ /gnas la the tshom 'di rnams ni/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni/ /gang du yang mi 'gro/ /gang du yang mi gnas so/ /the tshom 'di dag ni/ thog ma dang / tha ma dang /

dbus dang bral ba/ gnyis su med pa/ gnas gsum du snang ba/ thams cad du son pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad pa/ thams cad kyi don/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan par

byas pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa/ zhi ba mnyam pa med pa/ rtag par brjod pa/ mgon po skyob pa/ kun du rtog pa spangs pa/ dbyibs dang / kha dog dang bral ba/ rgyal ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir rgyal po/ phyed par dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje/ nyon mongs pa'i nye bar gdung ba

las grol ba'i phyir zla ba/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge /gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung po'o/ /de ltar dpe sna tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dper bya'o/ /de nyid ni gcig pu ste/ sems can thams cad rnams kyi don byed pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad

spangs kyang / bltams pa ston pa dang / khab nas mngon par 'byung ba dang / gzhon nu'i rol rtsed mdzad pa dang / rdo rje gdan gyis mnan pa dang / bdud btul ba mnyam med pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang / lha las babs pa nyams dga' ba dang / shin tu sna tshogs pa'i

cho 'phrul dang / glang chen nor skyong btul ba dang / skal ba dang ldan pa'i skye bo dag gzhug pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa dang / bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed ltos pa med pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab nyid dang / yongs

su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po chen po ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar 'di lta bu'i khyad par du ma rmi lam lta bur sangs rgyas kyi rol pa mchog ston par mdzad do/ /grub pa gang yin pa ni sgyu ma'i tshul gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad do/ /'di ni gsang ba

gsum las byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon par brjod pa'o/ /yong ye gang zhig 'jig rten las ma chags pa des 'di 'grub ste/ slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang tha na rgyal srid kyi bde ba la yang mi chags par bya zhes bshad la/ dpal shAkya thub pa mngon par bskul ba las kyang / gang

lha rnams kyis smras pa/ na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe/ /phongs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/ /rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom na/ /rnam par spong ste ri dgas klung skam bzhin/ /nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe/ /phongs shing sdug

'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/ nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe/ /rnam par spong ste mi yis 'phrog stong bzhin/ /ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing / /de bzhin sbyin 'dod ma la dga' bar byed/ /nor nyams sdug bsngal nyen cing spang pas na/ /de tshe dga' bar mi

'gyur bya rgod bzhin/ rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin/ /phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed/ /rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na/ /de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin/ /rga bas rgas byas na tshod yal 'gyur na/ /sdong po gnam

lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin/ /rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra/ /rga las 'byung ba thub pa myur du smros/ /skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams rga pas skems/ /ma lu'i khri shing sA la'i nags stug bzhin/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/

srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra/ /'gro ba'i skye 'chi gang la blta dang mtshungs/ /'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste/ /ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro/ /zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa/ nang med mi rtag tshe ring rtag ma yin/ /la nga tsho mi rtag 'byor pa

rtag ma yin/ /zhes so/ /'phags pa shA ri'i bus bshad pa la yang / grogs dag tshe 'di mi rtag myur 'gro ste/ /ri gzar chu dag mgyogs 'dra na/ /byis pa skye bos mi shes te/ /mi mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /'phags pa n+da gA rdzu nas kyang / /de

ltar 'di kun mi rtag bdag med de/ /skyabs med mgon med gnas med de slad du/ /'khor ba chu shing snying po med pa la/ /mi mchog khyod kyi thugs ni 'byung bar mdzod/ /ces bshad do/ /gang dbang thob pa yang ste/ gsang ba'i mdzod las gsungs pa/ dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan

na/ /skye dang skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de yi skye ba bdun la ni/ /ma bsgrubs par ni dngos grub thob/ /gang yang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing / /gal te dam tshig sdom la gnas/ /skye 'dir las dbang gis ma grub/ /skye ba gzhan du dngos grub 'thob/ /re zhig dam tshig nyams pa la/ /dngos

grub thob pa lta zhog gi /mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gang yang bla mar brgyud pa yi/ /rim 'ongs de nyid rim pa yis/ /sgrub po de yis 'grub snyam dgongs/ /zhes so/ /'di ni gsang ba gsum 'grub pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo mngon par brjod pa'o/ /gang rab tu dga' ba'i nam

mkha' la/ /tsaN+Dan me tog bud med bzang / /mthong ba gang cho 'dzag gyur pa/ /de tshe dga' bar yang dag bshad/ /sems can kun la rnam par gnas/ /sems can de dag kun gyi sems/ /dpag dka' skad cig nyid las shes/ /zhes gsungs pa ni bdag gis ma bkag ste/

longs spyod spyad par ma gsungs te/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis spyod pa gsungs/ /zhes gsungs la/ yang pad+mar chags pa'i sems spangs te/ zhes rgyud dag las bkag pa bstan pa dang bcas pa brjod pa'i phyir dang / rgyud las gang gsungs longs spyod ni

bdag gis kyang bkag pa med do/ /de ltar gsang chen gsum gyi bdag /mngon par brjod las byung ba yi/ /dge ba bdag la skyes gyur na/ /'gro ba gsang chen gsum 'jog shog /gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba/ slob dpon yu so ma pu rir byung ba'i dge slong dpal

ldan byang chub bzang po'i bla ma/ dpal ma hA ma ti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi slob dpon A tsaR+Ya du lo pa dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
